CVE-2014-0001.title: MySQL Buffer Overflow May Let Remote Servers Execute Arbitrary Code on the Target Client
CVE-2014-0001.body: A vulnerability was reported in MySQL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote server can send a specially crafted server version number string to trigger a buffer overflow in 'client/mysql.cc' and cause the client to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2014-0001.extra: A remote server may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target client.

CVE-2014-0009.title: Moodle Bug in 'login as' Feature Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Restrictions
CVE-2014-0009.body: A vulnerability was reported in Moodle. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions.A remote authenticated user with 'login as' privileges but without 'access all groups' capability can login to other groups by loading a specially crafted URL.Itamar Tzadok reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0009.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions.

CVE-2014-0010.title: Moodle Request Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-0010.body: A vulnerability was reported in Moodle. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The '/user/profile/index.php' script does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user to delete profile fields and categories.Jun Zhu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0010.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user to delete profile fields and categories.

CVE-2014-0015.title: libcURL May Use an Incorrect NTLM Connection
CVE-2014-0015.body: A vulnerability was reported in libcURL. A remote user may be able to obtain information from the wrong session.When responding to an NTLM-authenticated HTTP or HTTPS request, the system may use the wrong connection (a connection authenticated with different credentials).The vendor was notified on January 7, 2014.Paras Sethia reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0015.extra: A remote user can may obtain information from the wrong session.

CVE-2014-0081.title: Ruby on Rails Input Validation Flaw in number_to_currency, number_to_percentage, and number_to_human helpers Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0081.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby on Rails in certain helpers. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The number_to_currency, number_to_percentage, and number_to_human helpers do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Ruby on Rails software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Kevin Reintjes reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0081.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Ruby on Rails software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0088.title: nginx SPDY Implementation Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0088.body: A vulnerability was reported in nginx. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a flaw in the SPDY implementation and corrupt worker process memory, potentially executing arbitrary code on the target system.Only version 1.5.10 running on 32-bit platforms when compiled with the ngx_http_spdy_module module and configured with the 'spdy' option of the 'listen' directive is affected.Lucas Molas, researcher at Programa STIC, Fundacion and Dr. Manuel Sadosky, Buenos Aires, Argentina reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0088.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-0095.title: Apache Tomcat AJP Request Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0095.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Apache JServ Protocol (AJP) request with a content length of zero to cause the target process to hang and consume a request processing thread.The vulnerability was reintroduced in revision 1519838.
CVE-2014-0095.extra: A remote user can consume a request processing thread.

CVE-2014-0096.title: Apache Tomcat Security Manager Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Controls and View Files
CVE-2014-0096.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote authenticated user can bypass file access constraints in certain situations.A web application running under a security manager can define an XSLT to bypass file access constraints.The Tomcat security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0096.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass file access constraints in certain situations.

CVE-2014-0099.title: Apache Tomcat Content Length Header Processing Flaw May Let Remote Users Send a Request to Bypass a Reverse Proxy
CVE-2014-0099.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote user can submit a request that may bypass a reverse proxy.A remote user can supply a specially crafted content length header to potentially pass a request across a reverse proxy.
CVE-2014-0099.extra: A remote user can submit a request that may bypass a reverse proxy.

CVE-2014-0107.title: Oracle WebLogic Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Access and Modify Data and Deny Service
CVE-2014-0107.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle WebLogic. A remote user can partially access and modify data on the target system. A remote user can cause partial denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Portal Core Services component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2013-2186].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Server WLS Core Components component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2016-0574].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Server XML Parser component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2014-0107].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Server WLS Java Messaging Service component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2016-0573].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Server Coherence Container component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2016-0572].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Server WLS Core Components component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2016-0577].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebLogic Server WLS-Console component to partially modify data [CVE-2016-0464].The following researchers reported these and other Oracle product vulnerabilities:Adam Willard of Raytheon Foreground Security; Alexey Tyurin of ERPScan; Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod (via HP's Zero Day Initiative); Anonymous (via HP's Zero Day Initiative); Brandon Vincent; Cybersecurity-upv; David Litchfield of Google; Dmitry Janushkevich of Secunia Research; Fernando Russ of Onapsis; FortiGuard Labs of Fortinet, Inc.; Francois Goichon of Context Information Security; Igor Kopylenko of McAfee Database Security Research Team; Ivan Chalykin of ERPScan; Jakub Palaczynski from ING Services Polska; Karthikeyan Bhargavan, Gaetan Leurent of INRIA; Lovi Yu of Salesforce.com; Luca Carettoni; Matias Mevied of Onapsis; Mike Arnold (Bruk0ut) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative); Nassim Bouali; Nicholas Lemonias of Advanced Information Security Corporation; Nikita Kelesis of ERPScan; Peter Kostiuk of Salesforce.com; Ryan Giobbi of American Eagle Outfitters; Sergey Gorbaty of Salesforce.com; Shai Meir of McAfee Security Research; Spyridon Chatzimichail of COSMOTE - Mobile Telecommunications S.A.; Stefan Kanthak; Stephen Kost of Integrigy; Travis Emmert of Salesforce.com; and Will Dormann of CERT/CC.
CVE-2014-0107.extra: A remote user can partially access data on the target system.A remote user can partially modify data on the target system.A remote user can cause partial denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-0107.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware Bugs Let Remote Users Access and Modify Data and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0107.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Fusion Middleware. A remote user can partially access and modify data on the target system. A remote or local user can cause partial denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Sites component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2014-0107].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Endeca Server SSL/TLS component to partially access and partially modify data [CVE-2015-1793].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Tuxedo SSL/TLS component to partially access and partially modify data [CVE-2015-1793].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle BI Publisher BI Publisher Security component to partially access and partially modify data [CVE-2016-0470].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Web Cache SSL Support component to partially access data [CVE-2016-0439].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle BI Publisher Scheduler component to partially modify data [CVE-2016-0401].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle BI Publisher Scheduler component to partially modify data [CVE-2016-0429].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Identity Federation Admin component to partially modify data [CVE-2016-0404].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Web Cache SSL Support component to partially access data [CVE-2016-0430].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Web Cache SSL Support component to partially access data [CVE-2016-0433].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle BI Publisher Security component to partially access data [CVE-2016-0614].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Identity Federation Federation protocol support component to partially modify data [CVE-2016-0413].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Outside In Technology Outside In Filters component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4808, CVE-2016-0432, CVE-2015-6013, CVE-2015-6014, CVE-2015-6015].The following researchers reported these and other Oracle product vulnerabilities:Adam Willard of Raytheon Foreground Security; Alexey Tyurin of ERPScan; Andrea Micalizzi aka rgod (via HP's Zero Day Initiative); Anonymous (via HP's Zero Day Initiative); Brandon Vincent; Cybersecurity-upv; David Litchfield of Google; Dmitry Janushkevich of Secunia Research; Fernando Russ of Onapsis; FortiGuard Labs of Fortinet, Inc.; Francois Goichon of Context Information Security; Igor Kopylenko of McAfee Database Security Research Team; Ivan Chalykin of ERPScan; Jakub Palaczynski from ING Services Polska; Karthikeyan Bhargavan, Gaetan Leurent of INRIA; Lovi Yu of Salesforce.com; Luca Carettoni; Matias Mevied of Onapsis; Mike Arnold (Bruk0ut) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative); Nassim Bouali; Nicholas Lemonias of Advanced Information Security Corporation; Nikita Kelesis of ERPScan; Peter Kostiuk of Salesforce.com; Ryan Giobbi of American Eagle Outfitters; Sergey Gorbaty of Salesforce.com; Shai Meir of McAfee Security Research; Spyridon Chatzimichail of COSMOTE - Mobile Telecommunications S.A.; Stefan Kanthak; Stephen Kost of Integrigy; Travis Emmert of Salesforce.com; and Will Dormann of CERT/CC.
CVE-2014-0107.extra: A remote user can partially access data on the target system.A remote user can partially access data on the target system.A local user can cause partial denial of service conditions.A remote user can cause partial denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-0109.title: Apache CXF SOAP Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0109.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache CXF. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can post specially crafted content to the target SOAP endpoint to consume excessive memory on the target system.Content with a Content-Type of 'text/html' can trigger this flaw.Giancarlo Pellegrino and Davide Balzarotti reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0109.extra: A remote user can consume excessive memory on the target system.

CVE-2014-0110.title: Apache CXF Invalid Content SOAP Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0110.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache CXF. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SOAP message to cause the target service to fill the '/tmp' temporary directory.Giancarlo Pellegrino and Davide Balzarotti reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0110.extra: A remote user can consume all available space in the temporary directory.

CVE-2014-0119.title: Apache Tomcat Lets Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Controls and View Files
CVE-2014-0119.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Tomcat. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions and view certain files on the target system.In certain situations, a specially crafted web application can replace the XML parsers used by Tomcat to process XSLTs for the default servlet, JSP documents, tag library descriptors (TLDs), and tag plugin configuration files and then bypass XML external entity restrictions and view XML files of other applications.The Tomcat security team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0119.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions and view certain files on the target system.

CVE-2014-0160.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: Cisco IOS XE OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XE. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo19730 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: Splunk OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Splunk. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.The vendor has assigned SPL-82696 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: WebEx Meetings Server OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo17528 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: BlackBerry Link OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in BlackBerry Link. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: Cisco Mobility Services Engine OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Mobility Services Engine. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: Cisco Security Manager OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Security Manager. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo19265 to this vulnerability.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security and researchers from Codenomicon reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0160.title: OpenSSL TLS Heartbeat Buffer Overread Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0160.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote client or server can trigger a buffer overread in the processing of the TLS heartbeat extension to obtain up to 64k of memory (per heartbeat request), potentially including encryption keys.The vulnerability was introduced to the source code in December 2011 and to release version 1.0.1 in March 2012.[Editor's note: This vulnerability is known as the OpenSSL heartbleed vulnerability.]Neel Mehta of Google Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0160.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including encryption keys.

CVE-2014-0195.title: OpenSSL DTLS Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0195.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted DTLS fragments to the target DTLS client or server to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0195]. Only applications using OpenSSL as a DTLS client or server are affected.The vendor was notified on April 23, 2014.Juri Aedla reported this vulnerability (via HP's ZDI).A remote server can send a specially crafted DTLS handshake to the target DTLS client to trigger a recursion flaw and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2014-0221]. Only applications using OpenSSL as a DTLS client are affected.The vendor was notified on May 9, 2014.Imre Rad (Search-Lab Ltd.) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0195.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-0221.title: OpenSSL DTLS Processing Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0221.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted DTLS fragments to the target DTLS client or server to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0195]. Only applications using OpenSSL as a DTLS client or server are affected.The vendor was notified on April 23, 2014.Juri Aedla reported this vulnerability (via HP's ZDI).A remote server can send a specially crafted DTLS handshake to the target DTLS client to trigger a recursion flaw and cause the target service to crash [CVE-2014-0221]. Only applications using OpenSSL as a DTLS client are affected.The vendor was notified on May 9, 2014.Imre Rad (Search-Lab Ltd.) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0221.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-0232.title: OFBiz Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0232.body: A vulnerability was reported in OFBiz. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input for certain result and error messages. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the OFBiz software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Gregory Draperi reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0232.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the OFBiz software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0239.title: Samba DNS Reply Flag Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0239.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.The DNS protocol handler does not check for the 'reply' flag when processing DNS requests. As a result, a remote user can send a spoofed reply packet to cause the target server to respond to the spoofed packet with a reply packet, potentially causing a reply loop between two vulnerable servers.
CVE-2014-0239.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-0244.title: Samba smbd and nmbd Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0244.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Samba. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target nmbd service to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources and stop the NetBIOS name service [CVE-2014-0244].A Red Hat user reported this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can submit a non-unicode request for a valid unicode path name to trigger a memory overwrite error and cause the smbd service to crash [CVE-2014-3493].Simon Arlott reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0244.extra: A remote user can cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system.A remote authenticated user can cause the smbd service to crash.

CVE-2014-0248.title: Red Hat JBoss Web Framework Bug in AuthenticationFilter Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0248.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat JBoss Web Framework. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted authentication headers to trigger a Seam logging error in 'org.jboss.seam.web.AuthenticationFilter' and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Marek Schmidt of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0248.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-0251.title: Microsoft SharePoint Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0251.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted page to execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0251]. The code will run with the privileges of the target W3WP service.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-1754]. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted page to trigger a flaw in Microsoft Web Applications and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-1813]. The code will run with the privileges of the target W3WP service.
CVE-2014-0251.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the target W3WP service.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0253.title: Microsoft .NET Bugs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2014-0253.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security features.A remote user can send specially crafted HTTP POST requests to cause the target ASP.NET server to stop responding to client requests [CVE-2014-0253].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or a Windows .NET application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0257]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.Some .NET Framework components do not implement Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR). A remote user can bypass ASLR security controls [CVE-2014-0295].
CVE-2014-0253.extra: A remote user can create HTML or an application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can bypass address space layout randomization.

CVE-2014-0254.title: Microsoft Windows IPv6 Stack Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0254.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows IPv6 Stack. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IPv6 router advertisement packets via a target subnet to cause systems on the target subnet to stop responding.
CVE-2014-0254.extra: A remote user can cause systems on the target subnet to stop responding.

CVE-2014-0257.title: Microsoft .NET Bugs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2014-0257.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security features.A remote user can send specially crafted HTTP POST requests to cause the target ASP.NET server to stop responding to client requests [CVE-2014-0253].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or a Windows .NET application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0257]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.Some .NET Framework components do not implement Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR). A remote user can bypass ASLR security controls [CVE-2014-0295].
CVE-2014-0257.extra: A remote user can create HTML or an application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can bypass address space layout randomization.

CVE-2014-0258.title: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0258.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Office file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mateusz Jurczyk, Ivan Fratric, and Ben Hawkes of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0258.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Office file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mateusz Jurczyk, Ivan Fratric, and Ben Hawkes of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0258.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0259.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Office file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mateusz Jurczyk, Ivan Fratric, and Ben Hawkes of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0260.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0260.title: Microsoft SharePoint Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0260.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Office file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mateusz Jurczyk, Ivan Fratric, and Ben Hawkes of the Google Security Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0260.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0261.title: Microsoft Dynamics AX Bug in Query Filter Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0261.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Dynamics AX. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to a target Application Object Server (AOS) instance to trigger a flaw in the query filter and cause the target AOS instance to stop responding to client requests.
CVE-2014-0261.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target instance to stop responding to client requests.

CVE-2014-0262.title: Windows Kernel-Mode Driver Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-0262.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Windows Kernel-Mode Driver. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) does not properly use window handle thread-owned objects. A local user can run a specially crafted application to execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.xiaohong shi of Qihoo reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0262.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-0263.title: Microsoft Windows Direct2D Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0263.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Direct2D. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a file containing specially crafted specially crafted 2D geometric figures that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Omair (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0263.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0266.title: Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-0266.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML). A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user via Internet Explorer, will read files on the target user's local file system or read content of web domains with the privileges of the target user.FireEye, Inc. reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0266.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-0267.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-0267.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0267, CVE-2014-0269, CVE-2014-0270, CVE-2014-0272, CVE-2014-0273, CVE-2014-0274, CVE-2014-0275, CVE-2014-0276, CVE-2014-0277, CVE-2014-0278, CVE-2014-0279, CVE-2014-0280, CVE-2014-0281, CVE-2014-0283, CVE-2014-0284, CVE-2014-0285, CVE-2014-0286, CVE-2014-0287, CVE-2014-0288, CVE-2014-0289, CVE-2014-0290]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a flaw in the VBScript engine and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0271]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access potentially sensitive information from a different domain [CVE-2014-0293].A remote user may be able to leverage other vulnerabilities and exploit a permission validation flaw to run scripting code with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-0268].Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam), Code Audit Labs of VulnHunt, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Simon Zuckerbraun (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jose A. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will access potentially sensitive information from a different domain [CVE-2014-0293].A remote user may be able to leverage other vulnerabilities and exploit a permission validation flaw to run scripting code with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-0268].Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam), Code Audit Labs of VulnHunt, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Simon Zuckerbraun (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jose A. CVE-2014-0294.title: Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange Scanning Parsing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0294.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Forefront Protection for Exchange. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted email message to a target system that is monitored by Microsoft Forefront Protection 2010 for Exchange to trigger a parsing flaw and cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system when the email message is scanned. The code will run with the privileges of the configured service account.
CVE-2014-0294.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-0295.title: Microsoft .NET Bugs Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2014-0295.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can bypass security features.A remote user can send specially crafted HTTP POST requests to cause the target ASP.NET server to stop responding to client requests [CVE-2014-0253].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML or a Windows .NET application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-0257]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.Some .NET Framework components do not implement Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR). A remote user can bypass ASLR security controls [CVE-2014-0295].
CVE-2014-0295.extra: A remote user can create HTML or an application that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can bypass address space layout randomization.

CVE-2014-0316.title: Microsoft Local Remote Procedure Call (LRPC) Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass ASLR Security Protections
CVE-2014-0316.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Local Remote Procedure Call (LRPC). A remote user can bypass security protection features.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) protection features on the target user's system.Alex Ionescu reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0316.extra: A remote user can bypass security protection features.

CVE-2014-0331.title: Fortinet FortiADC Input Validation Flaw in 'locale' Parameter Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0331.body: A vulnerability was reported in Fortinet FortiADC. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web administration interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'locale' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Fortinet FortiADC web administration interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.William Costa reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0331.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Fortinet FortiADC web administration interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0338.title: WatchGuard Fireware XTM Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0338.body: A vulnerability was reported in WatchGuard Fireware XTM. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Fireware XTM web user interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target administrative user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the WatchGuard Fireware XTM web user interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.William Costa reported this vulnerability via US-CERT.
CVE-2014-0338.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the WatchGuard Fireware XTM web user interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0467.title: Mutt Buffer Overflow in mutt_copy_hdr() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0467.body: A vulnerability was reported in Mutt. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can send email with a specially crafted header value that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow in mutt_copy_hdr() in 'copy.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2014-0467.extra: A remote user can create an email message that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0475.title: Glibc Directory Traversal in Processing LC_* Environment Variables May Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-0475.body: A vulnerability was reported in Glibc. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can set arbitrary locales in certain LC_* environment variables and then execute a local program to exploit a directory traversal flaw in the processing of paths and potentially load and execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the local program.The vendor has assigned bug ID 17137 to this vulnerability.Stephane Chazelas reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0475.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-0491.title: Adobe Flash Player Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass Security Protections
CVE-2014-0491.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass security protections [CVE-2014-0491]. Masato Kinugawa reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass address layout randomization [CVE-2014-0492]. An anonymous user reported this vulnerability via Zero Day Initiative.These can be exploited to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.
CVE-2014-0491.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0492.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0493.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0493.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption [CVE-2014-0493, CVE-2014-0495] or use-after free [CVE-2014-0496] flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Mateusz Jurczyk and Gynvael Coldwind of the Google Security Team reported two vulnerabilities. Soroush Dalili (@irsdl) reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0493.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0497.title: Adobe Flash Player Integer Underflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-0497.body: A vulnerability was reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer underflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Alexander Polyakov and Anton Ivanov of Kaspersky Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0497.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-0537.title: Adobe Flash Bugs Permit Cross-Site Requeset Forgery Attacks and Let Remote Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2014-0537.body: Several vulnerabilities reported in Adobe Flash Player. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can bypass security controls.A remote user can create a specially crafted, all alphanumeric SWF file that, when processed via the target JSONP callback API, will bypass same origin policy, initiate arbitrary requests from the target user to the target domain, and provide data to the remote user [CVE-2014-4671].The original advisory is available at:http://miki.it/blog/2014/7/8/abusing-jsonp-with-rosetta-flash/Michele Spagnuolo reported this vulnerability.A remote user can create a specially crafted Flash content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass security controls [CVE-2014-0537, CVE-2014-0539].Masato Kinugawa reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0537.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target site acting as the target user.A remote user can bypass security controls to take control of the target system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can trigger a memory leak to bypass memory address randomization [CVE-2014-0540, CVE-2014-0542, CVE-2014-0543, CVE-2014-0544, CVE-2014-0545]. CVE-2014-0560.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Deny Service, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0560.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-0562]. Apple OS X systems are affected.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a use-after-free memory error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-0560].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption flaw and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2014-0563].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a heap overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-0561, CVE-2014-0567].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-0565, CVE-2014-0566].A remote user can bypass sandbox restrictions to exploit native code with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-0568]. Windows systems are affected.Wei Lei and Wu Hongjun of Nanyang Technological University (via Verisign iDefense Labs), Tom Ferris (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Frans Rosen of Detectify, Wei Lei and Wu Hongjun of Nanyang Technological University, an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative, and James Forshaw of Google Project Zero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0560.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with an arbitrary site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0566.title: Adobe Acrobat/Reader Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, Gain Elevated Privileges, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Deny Service
CVE-2014-0566.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe Acrobat/Reader. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can bypass security controls on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A buffer overflow vulnerability may occur [CVE-2015-5093].Heap buffer overflows may occur [CVE-2015-5096, CVE-2015-5098, CVE-2015-5105].Memory corruption errors may occur [CVE-2015-5087, CVE-2015-5094, CVE-2015-5100, CVE-2015-5102, CVE-2015-5103, CVE-2015-5104, CVE-2015-3095, CVE-2015-5115, CVE-2014-0566].A stack overflow may occur [CVE-2015-5110].Use-after-free memory errors may occur [CVE-2015-4448, CVE-2015-5095, CVE-2015-5099, CVE-2015-5101, CVE-2015-5111, CVE-2015-5113, CVE-2015-5114].Integer overflows may occur [CVE-2015-5097, CVE-2015-5108, CVE-2015-5109].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an information leak [CVE-2015-5107].Security bypass errors may occur to allow information disclosure [CVE-2015-4449, CVE-2015-4450, CVE-2015-5088, CVE-2015-5089, CVE-2015-5092, CVE-2014-8450].A remote user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. Validation bypass errors may occur to allow privilege escalation from low to medium integrity level [CVE-2015-4446, CVE-2015-5090, CVE-2015-5106].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a validation bypass flaw and cause denial of service conditions on the target system [CVE-2015-5091].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a null-pointer dereference and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4443, CVE-2015-4444].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass restrictions on JavaScript API execution [CVE-2015-4435, CVE-2015-4438, CVE-2015-4441, CVE-2015-4445, CVE-2015-4447, CVE-2015-4451, CVE-2015-4452, CVE-2015-5085, CVE-2015-5086].AbdulAziz Hariri and Jasiel Spelman of HP Zero Day Initiative, Alex Infuhr of Cure53.de, bilou via VeriSign iDefense Labs, Brian Gorenc of HP Zero Day Initiative, Security Research Team at MWR Labs (@mwrlabs), James Forshaw of Google Project Zero, Jihui Lu of KeenTeam, JinCheng Liu of the Alibaba Security Research Team, Jun Xie of the Alibaba Security Research Team, Keen Team via HP's Zero Day Initiative, kernelsmith via HP's Zero Day Initiative, Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero, Matt Molinyawe of HP Zero Day Initiative, Mauro Gentile of Minded Security, Nicolas Joly via HP's Zero Day Initiative, Wei Lei and Wu Hongjun of Nanyang Technological University, and Wu Ha of the Alibaba Security Research Team reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2014-0570.title: Adobe ColdFusion Bugs Let Local Users Bypass Access Controls and Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request ForgeryAttacks
CVE-2014-0570.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Adobe ColdFusion. A local user can bypass access control restrictions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A local user can bypass IP address access control restrictions on the ColdFusion Administrator account [CVE-2014-0572].A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-0570, CVE-2014-0571]. The code will originate from the site running the Macromedia ColdFusion software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Craig Young of Tripwire VERT, Pete Freitag, and Aaron Foote reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-0570.extra: A local user can bypass IP address access control restrictions.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Adobe ColdFusion software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0591.title: ISC BIND NSEC3-signed Zone Query Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-0591.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC BIND. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted query to an authoritative nameserver serving NSEC3-signed zones to cause the BIND service to crash.Authoritative nameservers serving at least one NSEC3-signed zone are affected.Recursive-only servers are not affected.Jared Mauch reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0591.extra: A remote user can cause the BIND service to crash.

CVE-2014-0600.title: Novell GroupWise Flaw in Administration Service Lets Remote Users View and Delete Files
CVE-2014-0600.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell GroupWise. A remote user can view and delete files on the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted 'poLibMaintenanceFileSave' parameter value to the 'FileUploadServlet' to exploit a flaw in 'gwadminservice' and view or delete files on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID 879192 to this vulnerability.Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported this vulnerability (via HP's Zero Day Initiative).
CVE-2014-0600.extra: A remote user can view and delete files on the target system.

CVE-2014-0611.title: Novell GroupWise Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0611.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Novell GroupWise. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Novell GroupWise webmail software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Mario Heiderich of Cure53 reported several vulnerabilities. Adrian Vollmer at SySS reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0611.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Novell GroupWise webmail software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0615.title: Juniper Junos CLI Commands Let Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-0615.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can invoke certain combinations of command-line interface (CLI) commands and arguments to gain root access to the operating system.The vendor has assigned PRs 924191, 921499, 921219, 915313, 915961, 914042, 915958, 915957, 913831, 913449, 913328, 912707, and 751925 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-0615.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-0639.title: EMC RSA Archer eGRC Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-0639.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC RSA Archer eGRC. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the RSA Archer eGRC software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-0639.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the RSA Archer eGRC software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0640.title: RSA Archer eGRC Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-0640.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in RSA Archer eGRC. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote authenticated user can access certain resources without proper authorization [CVE-2014-0640].A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-0641]. The code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user on the adjacent network can cause the application to download and arbitrary code from an untrusted control sphere [CVE-2014-2505].A remote authenticated user can access functions to perform unauthorized operations [CVE-2014-2517].
CVE-2014-0640.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

The code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user on the adjacent network can cause the application to download and arbitrary code from an untrusted control sphere [CVE-2014-2505].A remote authenticated user can access functions to perform unauthorized operations [CVE-2014-2517].
CVE-2014-0641.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-0648.title: Cisco Secure Access Control Server RMI and Web Interface Bugs Let Remote Users Gain Access
CVE-2014-0648.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Secure Access Control Server. A remote user can gain access to the target system.A remote user can access the RMI interface via TCP ports 2020 and 2030 to gain access to the target system and perform administrative actions [CVE-2014-0648]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCud75187 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the RMI interface to perform actions with 'superadmin' privileges [CVE-2014-0649]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCud75180 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the web interface to execute operating system-level commands on the target system [CVE-2014-0650]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCue65962 to this vulnerability.The following products are not affected:Cisco Secure Access Control Server for WindowsCisco Secure Access Control Server ExpressCisco Secure Access Control Server ViewCisco Secure Access Control Server Solution Engine
CVE-2014-0648.extra: A remote user can gain access to the target system.A remote authenticated user gain gain elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user can execute operating system commands.
