CVE-2014-2118.title: Cisco Prime Security Manager Dashboard Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2118.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Security Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The dashboard does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Prime Security Manager interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun50687 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2118.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Prime Security Manager interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2120.title: Cisco ASA Input Validation Hole in WebVPN Interface Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2120.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The WebVPN login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco ASA WebVPN interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun19025 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2120.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco ASA WebVPN interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2121.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution Flaw in Java Code Lets Remote Users Close Ports to Deny Service
CVE-2014-2121.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can trigger a flaw in the Java code to close TCP ports used by the target system.The vendor has assigned Bug IDs CSCug77633, CSCug77667, CSCug78266, CSCug82795, and CSCuh58643 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2121.extra: A remote user can close TCP ports on the target system.

CVE-2014-2122.title: Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution Memory Leak Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2122.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Hosted Collaboration Solution. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted packets to trigger a memory leak in the graphical user interface of the target Impact server.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCub58999 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2122.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-2124.title: Cisco Catalyst 6500 Supervisor Engine 2T Multicast Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2124.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Catalyst 6500 Supervisor Engine 2T. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted packets to exploit a flaw in the processing of multicast data in the Supervisor Engine 2T (Sup2T) and cause the target device to crash.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuf60783 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2124.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.

CVE-2014-2125.title: Cisco Unity Connection Input Validation Hole in Web Inbox Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2125.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unity Connection. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Web Inbox does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Unity Connection Web Inbox interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCui33028 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2125.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Unity Connection Web Inbox interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2130.title: Cisco Secure Access Control Server Tomcat Administration Interface Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2130.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Secure Access Control Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.The Cisco Secure Access Control Server (ACS) includes a default Tomcat administration interface. A remote authenticated ACS administrative user can access the interface and modify application files and the web interface configuration to execute arbitrary code on the target system with the privileges of the web service.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj83189 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2130.extra: A remote authenticated ACS administrative user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-2147.title: Cisco Prime Infrastructure Web Interface Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2147.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Prime Infrastructure. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The web framework does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in several parameters of INSERT-related HTML pages before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Prime Infrastructure interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuj42444 [for CVE-2014-2147], CSCun21868 [for for CVE-2014-2153], and CSCun21869 [for CVE-2014-2153] to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2147.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Prime Infrastructure web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2151.title: Cisco ASA Input Validation Flaw in WebVPN Interface Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-2151.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASA. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted Javascript file that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will obtain potentially sensitive information from the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCui04520 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2151.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target system.

CVE-2014-2152.title: Cisco Prime Infrastructure Web Interface Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2152.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Prime Infrastructure. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The web framework does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in several parameters of INSERT-related HTML pages before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Prime Infrastructure interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuj42444 [for CVE-2014-2147], CSCun21868 [for for CVE-2014-2153], and CSCun21869 [for CVE-2014-2153] to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2152.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Prime Infrastructure web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2153.title: Cisco Prime Infrastructure Web Interface Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2153.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Prime Infrastructure. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The web framework does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in several parameters of INSERT-related HTML pages before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Prime Infrastructure interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuj42444 [for CVE-2014-2147], CSCun21868 [for for CVE-2014-2153], and CSCun21869 [for CVE-2014-2153] to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2153.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Prime Infrastructure web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2176.title: Cisco IOS XR ASR 9000 IPv6 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2176.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR on ASR 9000 routers. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IPv6 packets to cause the target Network Processor (NP) chip and line card to lock up and eventually reload.Only Trident-based line cards on Cisco ASR 9000 Series Aggregation Services Routers are affected.On systems not configured for IPv6, a remote user on the adjacent network can exploit this flaw. On systems configured for IPv6, a remote user can exploit this flaw.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun71928 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2176.extra: A remote user can cause the target Network Processor (NP) chip and line card to lock up and reload.

CVE-2014-2177.title: Cisco Small Business RV Series Router Bugs Let Remote Users Upload Arbitrary Files and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Commands Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2177.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Small Business RV Series routers. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to exploit a flaw in the network diagnostics administration pages to execute arbitrary commands on the target system [CVE-2014-2177]. The commands will run with root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87126 to this vulnerability.A remote user can conduct a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attack to take actions on the target administrative interface acting as the target administrator [CVE-2014-2178].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87145 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the target device to upload files to arbitrary locations on the target device with root privileges [CVE-2014-2179].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh86998 to this vulnerability.Yorick Koster of Securify (www.securify.nl) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-2177.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.A remote user can upload files to arbitrary locations with root privileges.

CVE-2014-2178.title: Cisco Small Business RV Series Router Bugs Let Remote Users Upload Arbitrary Files and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Commands Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2178.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Small Business RV Series routers. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to exploit a flaw in the network diagnostics administration pages to execute arbitrary commands on the target system [CVE-2014-2177]. The commands will run with root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87126 to this vulnerability.A remote user can conduct a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attack to take actions on the target administrative interface acting as the target administrator [CVE-2014-2178].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87145 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the target device to upload files to arbitrary locations on the target device with root privileges [CVE-2014-2179].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh86998 to this vulnerability.Yorick Koster of Securify (www.securify.nl) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-2178.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.A remote user can upload files to arbitrary locations with root privileges.

CVE-2014-2179.title: Cisco Small Business RV Series Router Bugs Let Remote Users Upload Arbitrary Files and Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Commands Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2179.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Small Business RV Series routers. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system. A remote user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to exploit a flaw in the network diagnostics administration pages to execute arbitrary commands on the target system [CVE-2014-2177]. The commands will run with root privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87126 to this vulnerability.A remote user can conduct a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attack to take actions on the target administrative interface acting as the target administrator [CVE-2014-2178].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87145 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the target device to upload files to arbitrary locations on the target device with root privileges [CVE-2014-2179].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh86998 to this vulnerability.Yorick Koster of Securify (www.securify.nl) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-2179.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with root privileges.A remote user can upload files to arbitrary locations with root privileges.

CVE-2014-2186.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2186.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The web framework code does not properly validate requests. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks to take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81777 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2186.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2190.title: Cisco Broadband Access Center Telco Wireless Software Bug Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2190.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Broadband Access Center Telco Wireless Software. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can take actions on the Cisco Broadband Access Center Telco Wireless (BAC-TW) Software interface acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuo23804 and CSCuo26389 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2190.extra: A remote user can take actions on the Cisco Broadband Access Center Telco Wireless Software interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2191.title: Cisco Broadband Access Center Telco Wireless Software Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2191.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Broadband Access Center Telco Wireless Software. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web framework does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Broadcast Access Center Telco Wireless (BAC-TW) software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun91113 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2191.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Broadcast Access Center Telco Wireless software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2195.title: Cisco Email Security Appliance Group Name Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Security Restrictions
CVE-2014-2195.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Email and Content Security Appliances. A remote user can bypass security restrictions.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the the group processing function of systems configured to use Microsoft Active Directory services as the authentication database to bypass security restrictions. A remote user may be assigned a different role then intended.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum86085 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2195.extra: A remote user can bypass security restrictions.

CVE-2014-2196.title: Cisco Wide Area Application Services Buffer Overflow in Processing SharePoint Responses Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2196.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Wide Area Application Services (WAAS). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.On systems configured with the SharePoint acceleration feature, a remote user can return specially crafted SharePoint responses to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target WAAS system. The code will run with elevated privileges on the target WAAS system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCue18479 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2196.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-2197.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager Bugs Let Remote Users Access the System and Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-2197.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager. A remote user can gain root access on the target system. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can access and modify settings.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted URL to trigger a flaw in the Administration interface and change the administrative credentials of an arbitrary user [CVE-2014-2197]. This can be exploited to gain elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun49862 to this vulnerability. Fatih Ozavci from Sense of Security reported this vulnerability.The system uses a default SSH private key that is stored in an non-secure manner [CVE-2014-2198]. A remote user can obtain the SSH private key and use the key to login to the target system with root privileges. The key may be obtained, for example, by reverse engineering the binary file of the operating system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCud41130 to this vulnerability.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to access and modify BVSMWeb portal user information (e.g., personal phone directory settings, speed dials, Single Number Reach, call forward settings) [CVE-2014-3300]. Fatih Ozavci from Sense of Security reported this vulnerability.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum77041 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2197.extra: A remote user can gain root access on the target system.A remote authenticated user can obtain administrative privileges on the target system.A remote user can access and modify settings (e.g., personal phone directory settings, speed dials, Single Number Reach, call forward settings).

CVE-2014-2199.title: Cisco WebEx Event Center Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Users
CVE-2014-2199.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Event Center. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.Meeting identifiers are not randomly generated and can be enumerated. A remote user can use an enumerated meeting identifier to obtain potentially sensitive information, such as the meeting title, meeting organizer, time, date, and duration of the meeting.A remote user can participate in the audio bridge.The following versions are affected:Cisco WebEx Business Suite (WBS29) prior to 29.5.1.14 ECisco WebEx Business Suite (WBS28) prior to T28L10NSP12EP13.18 (28.12.13.18 E)Cisco WebEx Business Suite (WBS27) prior to T27L10NSP32EP31.16 (27.32.31.16 E)The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuo68624 and CSCue46738 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2199.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information, including the meeting title, meeting organizer, time, date, and duration of the meeting.

CVE-2014-2210.title: CA ERwin Web Portal Directory Traversal Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Information, Deny Service, and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2210.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in CA ERwin Web Portal. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted requests to traverse the directory to obtain potentially sensitive information, cause denial of service conditions, gain elevated privileges, and potentially execute arbitrary code.Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported this vulnerability (via HP's Zero Day Initiative).
CVE-2014-2210.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-2240.title: FreeType Buffer Overflow in CFF Driver Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2240.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeType. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted font that, when processed by the target application, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the application using FreeType.
CVE-2014-2240.extra: A remote user can create a font file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-2263.title: FFmpeg Buffer Overflow in mpegts_write_pmt() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2263.body: A vulnerability was reported in FFmpeg. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the mpegts_write_pmt() function and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'libavformat/mpegtsenc.c'.
CVE-2014-2263.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-2276.title: EMC Connectrix Manager Converged Network Edition Input Validation Flaw in 'FileUploadController' Lets Remote Users Download Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-2276.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Connectrix. A remote user can view files on the target system.A remote user can exploit an input validation flaw in the 'FileUploadController' servlet to view arbitrary files on the target system.Bluesea (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2276.extra: A remote user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2014-2281.title: Wireshark NFS/M3UA/RLC Dissector Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and MPEG Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2281.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted packet trace file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the MPEG file parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2299]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.The NFS dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2281]The M3UA dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2282]. Versions 1.10.0 to 1.10.5 are affected.The RLC dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2283].Moshe Kaplan, Laurent Butti, and Wesley Neelen each reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2281.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause Wireshark to crash.

CVE-2014-2282.title: Wireshark NFS/M3UA/RLC Dissector Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and MPEG Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2282.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted packet trace file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the MPEG file parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2299]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.The NFS dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2281]The M3UA dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2282]. Versions 1.10.0 to 1.10.5 are affected.The RLC dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2283].Moshe Kaplan, Laurent Butti, and Wesley Neelen each reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2282.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause Wireshark to crash.

CVE-2014-2299.title: Wireshark NFS/M3UA/RLC Dissector Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service and MPEG Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2299.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Wireshark. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted packet trace file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow in the MPEG file parser and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2299]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target service to crash.The NFS dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2281]The M3UA dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2282]. Versions 1.10.0 to 1.10.5 are affected.The RLC dissector is affected [CVE-2014-2283].Moshe Kaplan, Laurent Butti, and Wesley Neelen each reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2299.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause Wireshark to crash.

CVE-2014-2309.title: Linux Kernel IPv6 Router Advertisement Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2309.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted IPv6 router advertisement packets to cause the target kernel to crash.Systems built with IPv6 protocol support (CONFIG_IPv6) and configured with IPv6 temporary addresses enabled are affected.
CVE-2014-2309.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2014-2341.title: CubeCart PHPSESSID Session Fixation Attack Lets Remote Users Hijack Sessions
CVE-2014-2341.body: A vulnerability was reported in CubeCart. A remote user can hijack a target user's session.A remote user can conduct a session fixation attack by specifying a PHPSESSID value that, when loaded by the target user, will enable the remote user to hijack the target user's session using the same PHPSESSID.James Sibley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2341.extra: A remote user can hijack a target user's session.

CVE-2014-2385.title: Sophos Anti-Virus Input Validation Flaw in Configuration Console Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2385.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Sophos Anti-Virus Configuration Console. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Sophos Anti-Virus configuration console software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on February 14, 2014.The original advisory is available at:https://www.portcullis-security.com/security-research-and-downloads/security-advisories/cve-2014-2385/Pablo Catalina reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2385.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Sophos Anti-Virus configuration console software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2390.title: McAfee Network Security Manager Input Validation Flaw in User Management Module Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2390.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee Network Security Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The User Management module does not properly validate user-supplied requests. A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will take actions on the device interface acting as the target user.Adi Volkovitz and Oded Vanunu from the Check Point Security Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2390.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target device acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2502.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication (Hosted) Input Validation Flaw in 'rsa_fso.swf' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2502.body: A vulnerability was reported in RSA Adaptive Authentication (Hosted). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'rsa_fso.swf' file does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the RSA Adaptive Authentication (Hosted) interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-2502.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the RSA Adaptive Authentication (Hosted) interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2503.title: EMC Documentum Digital Asset Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject DQL Commands
CVE-2014-2503.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum Digital Asset Manager. A remote user can inject DQL commands.The Digital Asset Manager (DAM) thumbnail proxy server does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute DQL commands on the underlying database.
CVE-2014-2503.extra: A remote user can execute DQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-2504.title: EMC Documentum D2 Methods Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary DQL Queries
CVE-2014-2504.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum D2. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary queries on the target system.A remote authenticated user can invoke D2 core methods and a D2FS web service method to execute arbitrary Documentum Query Language (DQL) queries on the target system. The queries will run with superuser privileges.
CVE-2014-2504.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary DQL queries on the target system.

CVE-2014-2506.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Inject DQL Commands
CVE-2014-2506.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system. A remote authenticated user can inject DQL commands.A remote authenticated non-privileged user can create system objects with super user privileges to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2014-2506].A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to inject shell commands [CVE-2014-2507].The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in certain DQL hints. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute DQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2508]. Pedro Laguna from Pentura reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2506.extra: A remote authenticated non-privileged user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute DQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-2507.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Inject DQL Commands
CVE-2014-2507.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system. A remote authenticated user can inject DQL commands.A remote authenticated non-privileged user can create system objects with super user privileges to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2014-2506].A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to inject shell commands [CVE-2014-2507].The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in certain DQL hints. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute DQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2508]. Pedro Laguna from Pentura reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2507.extra: A remote authenticated non-privileged user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute DQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-2508.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Inject DQL Commands
CVE-2014-2508.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system. A remote authenticated user can inject DQL commands.A remote authenticated non-privileged user can create system objects with super user privileges to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2014-2506].A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to inject shell commands [CVE-2014-2507].The software does not properly validate user-supplied input in certain DQL hints. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute DQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2508]. Pedro Laguna from Pentura reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2508.extra: A remote authenticated non-privileged user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary shell commands on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute DQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-2510.title: EMC Documentum Foundation Services Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Files From the Target System
CVE-2014-2510.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum Foundation Services. A remote authenticated user can obtain files from the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) data to the EMC Documentum Foundation Services (DFS) XML interface to trigger a flaw in the JAXB XML parser and read files on the target system.Lukasz Plonka reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2510.extra: A remote user can obtain files from the target system.

CVE-2014-2511.title: EMC Documentum WebTop Products Input Validation Flaws in 'startat' and 'entryId' Parameters Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2511.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum WebTop products. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several EMC Documentum WebTop based products do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'startat' and 'entryId' parameters before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Documentum software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The following product versions are affected:EMC WebTop 6.7 SP1, 6.7 SP2EMC Documentum Administrator 6.7 SP1, 6.7 SP2, 7.0, 7.1.EMC Records Client 6.7 SP1, 6.7 SP2EMC Digital Assets Manager 6.5 SP5, 6.5 SP6EMC Web Publishers 6.5 SP6, 6.5 SP7EMC Task Space 6.7 SP1, 6.7 SP2EMC Engineering Plant Facilities Management Solution for Documentum 1.7 SP1EMC Documentum Capital Projects 1.8EMC Documentum Capital Projects 1.9Lukasz Plonka reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2511.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Documentum software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2512.title: EMC Documentum eRoom Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2512.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum eRoom. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Documentum software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.M. Heinzl of SEC Consult Vulnerability Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2512.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Documentum software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2513.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2513.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can invoke custom scripts to execute arbitrary code on the target system with super user privileges [CVE-2014-2513].A remote authenticated user can run RPC commands on arbitrary objects with super user privileges [CVE-2014-2514].
CVE-2014-2513.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with super user privileges.

CVE-2014-2514.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2514.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can invoke custom scripts to execute arbitrary code on the target system with super user privileges [CVE-2014-2513].A remote authenticated user can run RPC commands on arbitrary objects with super user privileges [CVE-2014-2514].
CVE-2014-2514.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with super user privileges.

CVE-2014-2515.title: EMC Documentum D2 Methods Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-2515.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum D2. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.The D2GetAdminTicketMethod and D2RefreshCacheMethod methods grant superuser privileges. A remote authenticated user can exploit these methods to obtain full control of the the target system.
CVE-2014-2515.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain superuser privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-2518.title: EMC Documentum Web Development Kit Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2518.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC Documentum. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The Web Development Kit does not properly validate user-supplied requests. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will take actions on the site acting as the target user.The following product versions are affected:EMC Documentum Webtop Versions prior 6.7SP1 P28EMC Documentum Webtop Versions prior 6.7SP2 P15EMC Documentum Administrator Versions prior 6.7 SP1 P28EMC Documentum Administrator Versions prior 6.7 SP2 P15EMC Documentum Administrator Versions prior 7.0 P15EMC Documentum Administrator Versions prior 7.1 P06EMC Documentum WDK Versions prior 6.7 SP1 P28EMC Documentum WDK Versions prior 6.7 SP2 P15EMC Documentum Taskspace versions prior 6.7 SP1 P28EMC Documentum Taskspace versions prior 6.7 SP2 P15EMC Documentum Records Manager versions prior 6.7 SP1 P28EMC Documentum Records Manager versions prior 6.7 SP2 P15EMC Documentum Web Publisher versions prior 6.5 SP7 P15 EMC Documentum Digital Asset Manager versions prior 6.5 SP6 P15EMC Documentum Engineering Plant Facilities Management Solution, 1.7 SP1 supported on WebTop 6.7 SP1 version, prior P13EMC Documentum Capital Projects, 1.8 supported on WebTop 6.7 SP1 version, prior P11EMC Documentum Capital Projects, 1.8 supported on WebTop 6.7 SP2 version, prior P11EMC Documentum Capital Projects, 1.9 supported on WebTop 6.7 SP2
CVE-2014-2518.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2519.title: EMC RecoverPoint Internal Firewall Ruleset Error Lets Remote Users Bypass the Firewall
CVE-2014-2519.body: A vulnerability was reported in EMC RecoverPoint. A remote user can bypass the firewall.The firewall rule designed to drop all incoming connections except connections to those ports explicitly permitted was not enabled by default. A remote user can bypass the firewall function to conduct port scanning or access services on the target device.
CVE-2014-2519.extra: A remote user can bypass the firewall to access ports on the target system.

CVE-2014-2520.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject DQL Commands, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-2520.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can inject DQL commands. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary Documentum methods with superuser privileges on the target system [CVE-2014-4618].A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute DQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2520].A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted RPC commands to the target Content Server to view metadata of system objects without proper authorization [CVE-2014-2521].
CVE-2014-2520.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute DQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-2521.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject DQL Commands, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-2521.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in EMC Documentum Content Server. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can inject DQL commands. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary Documentum methods with superuser privileges on the target system [CVE-2014-4618].A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute DQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2520].A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted RPC commands to the target Content Server to view metadata of system objects without proper authorization [CVE-2014-2521].
CVE-2014-2521.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute DQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-2523.title: Linux Kernel Netfilter DCCP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2523.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted DCCP data to trigger a memory corruption flaw in 'nf_conntrack_proto_dccp.c' and execute arbitrary code on the target system.
CVE-2014-2523.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-2532.title: OpenSSH AcceptEnv Wildcard Processing Flaw May Let Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Environment Restrictions
CVE-2014-2532.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSH. A remote authenticated user can bypass environment restrictions in certain cases.When configured for environment passing (not the default), the software does not properly process wildcard characters on AcceptEnv lines in the 'sshd_config' configuration file. A remote user may be able to supply specially crafted parameter values to bypass environment restrictions and set certain environment variables.
CVE-2014-2532.extra: A remote authenticated user can bypass environment restrictions in certain cases and set certain environment variables.

CVE-2014-2537.title: Sophos UTM TCP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2537.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sophos UTM. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted TCP data to trigger a kernel memory leak and consume excessive memory resources on the target system.
CVE-2014-2537.extra: A remote user can consume excessive memory resources on the target system.

CVE-2014-2541.title: TIBCO Rendezvous Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain and Modify Information, Execute Arbitrary Code, and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2541.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in TIBCO Rendezvous. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can obtain and modify potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass access controls in some cases to obtain and modify potentially sensitive information [CVE-2014-2541].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-2542]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the TIBCO Rendezvous software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2543]. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.The following components are affected:TIBCO Rendezvous Daemon (rvd)TIBCO Rendezvous Routing Daemon (rvrd)TIBCO Rendezvous Secure Daemon (rvsd)TIBCO Rendezvous Secure Routing Daemon (rvsrd)The TIBCO Messaging Appliance and TIBCO Substation ES products are also affected.
CVE-2014-2541.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the TIBCO Rendezvous software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain and modify potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-2578.title: Splunk Unspecified Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2578.body: A vulnerability was reported in Splunk. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Splunk software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Tyler Cui reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2578.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Splunk software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2580.title: Xen Netback Packet Processing Flaw Lets Local Guest Administrators Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Host
CVE-2014-2580.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.A local administrative user on the guest operating system can send a specially crafted packet to netback to cause netback to disable the interface and cause the host system to crash.Systems using Linux as the driver domain are affected.Versions of Linux where netback uses NAPI are affected (e.g., 3.11 and 3.12-rc1 and later versions).Both x86 and ARM systems are affected.Torok Edwin reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2580.extra: A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause the target host system to crash.

CVE-2014-2587.title: McAfee Asset Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands and Download Files
CVE-2014-2587.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee Asset Manager. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request to exploit a flaw in the 'downloadReport' function and view arbitrary files on target system [CVE-2014-2588].A demonstration HTTP GET request URL is provided:/servlet/downloadReport?reportFileName=../../../../../../../../etc/passwd&format=CSVA remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted 'user' parameter value to the 'ReportsAudit.jsp' script to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2587].
CVE-2014-2587.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2014-2588.title: McAfee Asset Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands and Download Files
CVE-2014-2588.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in McAfee Asset Manager. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request to exploit a flaw in the 'downloadReport' function and view arbitrary files on target system [CVE-2014-2588].A demonstration HTTP GET request URL is provided:/servlet/downloadReport?reportFileName=../../../../../../../../etc/passwd&format=CSVA remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted 'user' parameter value to the 'ReportsAudit.jsp' script to execute SQL commands on the underlying database [CVE-2014-2587].
CVE-2014-2588.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.

CVE-2014-2589.title: SonicWALL Network Security Appliance 2400 Input Validation Flaw in 'dashboard.jsp' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2589.body: A vulnerability was reported in SonicWALL Network Security Appliance 2400. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The backend server 'dashboard.jsp' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the SonicWALL interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on September 27, 2013.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vulnerability-lab.com/get_content.php?id=1100BenjamBenjamin Kunz Mejri of Vulnerability Laboratory Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2589.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the SonicWALL interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2599.title: Xen HVMOP_set_mem_access Input Validation Flaw Lets Local Guest Users Deny Service on the Host System
CVE-2014-2599.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.The HVMOP_set_mem_access HVM control operations does not properly validate input size. A local administrative user on an HVM guest operating system can consume excessive CPU resources on the host operating system.On version 4.2, only 64-bit versions of the hypervisor are affected.Device model emulators (qemu-dm) are affected.Jan Beulich reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2599.extra: A local administrative user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.

CVE-2014-2609.title: HP IT Executive Scorecard Bugs Let Remote Users Traverse the Directory and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2609.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP IT Executive Scorecard. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can traverse the directory on the target system.No details were provided.The vendor was notified on January 30 and 31, 2014.The vendor has assigned SSRT101431, SSRT101435, and SSRT101436 to these vulnerabilities.Mike Arnold (Bruk0ut) reported these vulnerabilities via HP's Zero Day Initiative.
CVE-2014-2609.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can traverse the directory on the target system.

CVE-2014-2610.title: HP IT Executive Scorecard Bugs Let Remote Users Traverse the Directory and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2610.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP IT Executive Scorecard. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. CVE-2014-2611.title: HP IT Executive Scorecard Bugs Let Remote Users Traverse the Directory and Execute Arbitrary Code

CVE-2014-2614.title: HP SiteScope Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2014-2614.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP SiteScope. A remote user can bypass authentication.No details were provided.The vendor has assigned SSRT101473 to this vulnerability.Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported this vulnerability (via HP's Zero Day Initiative).
CVE-2014-2614.extra: A remote user can bypass authentication.

CVE-2014-2625.title: HP Network Virtualization Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2625.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in HP Network Virtualization. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-2626]. The vendor has assigned SSRT101359 to this vulnerability.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information and modify data on the target system [CVE-2014-2625]. The vendor has assigned SSRT101358 to this vulnerability.HP Shunra Network Virtualization for HP Load Generator is affected.
CVE-2014-2625.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can modify data on the target system.

A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-2626]. The vendor has assigned SSRT101359 to this vulnerability.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information and modify data on the target system [CVE-2014-2625]. The vendor has assigned SSRT101358 to this vulnerability.HP Shunra Network Virtualization for HP Load Generator is affected.
CVE-2014-2626.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can modify data on the target system.

CVE-2014-2629.title: HP NonStop Server Safeguard Security Software ACL Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Unauthorized Access
CVE-2014-2629.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP NonStop Server. A remote authenticated user can gain unauthorized access to a program on the target system.The system may not properly evaluate DISKFILE-PATTERN ACLs at the time of process creation.The Safeguard Security Software is affected.The vendor has assigned SSRT101655 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2629.extra: A remote authenticated user can access a program on the target system to partially access data.

CVE-2014-2633.title: HP Service Manager Bugs Let Remote Users Gain Elevated Privileges, Modify Data, and Deny Service and Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Requset Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2633.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Service Manager. A remote user can gain full control of the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can modify data and cause denial of service conditions.The Mobility Web Client and Service Request Catalog do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2013-6222]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP Service Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can exploit flaws in the WebTier to gain elevated privileges and take full control of the target system [CVE-2014-2632].A remote user can exploit flaws in the Service Manager Server to take actions on the target site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-2633].A remote user can gain unauthorized access on the Service Manager Server to modify data and cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2014-2634].
CVE-2014-2633.extra: A remote user can gain full control of the target system.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Service Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can modify information or cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-2640.title: HP System Management Homepage Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting, Cross-Site Request Forgery, and Clickjacking Attacks
CVE-2014-2640.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP System Management Homepage. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting, cross-site request forgery, and clickjacking attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-2640]. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Management Homepage software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks to take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-2641].A remote user can hijack a target user's mouse clicks to take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-2642].
CVE-2014-2640.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP System Management Homepage software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.

A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-2640]. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Management Homepage software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks to take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-2641].A remote user can hijack a target user's mouse clicks to take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-2642].
CVE-2014-2642.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP System Management Homepage software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.

CVE-2014-2644.title: HP Systems Insight Manager Bugs Permit Remote Cross-Site Scripting and Clickjacking Attacks and Let Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-2644.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in HP Systems Insight Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can conduct clickjacking attack.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-2644]. The code will originate from the site running the HP Systems Insight Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2014-2643]. A remote user can hijack a target user's mouse clicks to take actions on the site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-2645].
CVE-2014-2644.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP Systems Insight Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-2668.title: Apache CouchDB 'uuids' Count Parameter Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2668.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache CouchDB. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a GET request to '_uuids' with a specially crafted 'count' parameter value to cause the target service to hang or crash.A demonstration exploit URL is provided:http://[target]/_uuids?count=99999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999999The original advisory is available at:http://www.exploit-db.com/exploits/32519/KrustyHack reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2668.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to hang or crash.

CVE-2014-2690.title: Citrix VDI-in-a-Box Discloses Administrator Password to Local Users
CVE-2014-2690.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix VDI-in-a-Box. A local user can obtain the administrator's password.The system may log administrator credentials to disk.
CVE-2014-2690.extra: A local user can obtain the administrator's password.

CVE-2014-2711.title: Juniper Junos Input Validation Flaw in J-Web Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2711.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos J-Web. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The J-Web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Juniper Junos J-Web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned PR 940744 to this vulnerability.Chuck McAuley reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2711.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Juniper Junos J-Web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2712.title: Juniper Junos Input Validation Flaw in J-Web Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2712.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos J-Web. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The J-Web interface 'index.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Juniper Junos J-Web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned PR 738631 and 939456 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2712.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Juniper Junos J-Web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2714.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series Enhanced Web Filtering Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2714.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted URL to cause the target flow daemon (flowd) process to crash and restart.Systems with Enhanced Web Filtering (EWF) enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 877830 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2714.extra: A remote user can cause the target flow daemon to crash and reboot.

CVE-2014-2753.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2753.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.s3tm3m (via VeriSign iDefense Labs) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2778.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-2779.title: Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Scanning Bug Lets Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2779.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Malware Protection Engine. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can create a specially crafted file that, when scanned by the Microsoft Malware Protection Engine, will prevent the engine from monitoring the system(s) until the file is removed and the service is restarted.The following product versions are affected:Microsoft Forefront Client SecurityMicrosoft Forefront Endpoint Protection 2010Microsoft Forefront Security for SharePoint SP3Microsoft System Center 2012 Endpoint ProtectionMicrosoft System Center 2012 Endpoint Protection SP1Microsoft Malicious Software Removal ToolMicrosoft Security EssentialsMicrosoft Security Essentials PrereleaseWindows Defender for Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012, and Windows Server 2012 R2Windows Defender for Windows RT and Windows RT 8.1Windows Defender for Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, and Windows Server 2008 R2Windows Defender OfflineWindows Intune Endpoint Protection Tavis Ormandy of Google Project Zero reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2779.extra: A remote or local user can prevent the engine from monitoring the target system(s).

CVE-2014-2781.title: Microsoft Windows On-Screen Keyboard Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-2781.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows On-Screen Keyboard. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target system with the privileges of the target user.lokihardt@asrt (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2781.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-2782.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2782.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Simon Zuckerbraun (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), HP's Zero Day Initiative, VUPEN (via HP's Zero Day Initiative, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Andreas Schmidt (via HP's Zero Day Initiative, Atte Kettunen of OUSPG, Liu Long of Qihoo, Yujie Wen of Qihoo, Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), The Prosecco team of Institut National de Recherche en Informatique et en Automatique (INRIA), Omair (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), John Villamil, Sean Larsson, AMol NAik (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Stephen Fewer of Harmony Security (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Hui Gao of Palo Alto Networks, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Soroush Dalili (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), NSFOCUS Security Team, lokihardt@ASRT (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Zhibin Hu of Qihoo, Yuki Chen of Qihoo, ZhaoWei of knownsec, SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), Xiaobo Chen of FireEye, Gareth Heyes (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 0016EECD9D7159A949DAD3BC17E0A939 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Royce Lu of Palo Alto Networks, Xin Ouyang of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Zuckerbraun (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Keen Team, AbdulAziz Hariri of HP's Zero Day Initiative, and VUPEN (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
