A remote user can bypass Extended Validation (EV) SSL certificate guidelines.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-1763, CVE-2014-1765, CVE-2014-2785, CVE-2014-2786, CVE-2014-2787, CVE-2014-2788, CVE-2014-2789, CVE-2014-2790, CVE-2014-2791, CVE-2014-2792, CVE-2014-2794, CVE-2014-2795, CVE-2014-2797, CVE-2014-2798, CVE-2014-2800, CVE-2014-2801, CVE-2014-2802, CVE-2014-2803, CVE-2014-2804, CVE-2014-2806, CVE-2014-2807, CVE-2014-2809, CVE-2014-2813].The code will run with the privileges of the target user.VUPEN (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Andreas Schmidt (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 0016EECD9D7159A949DAD3BC17E0A939 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Yujie Wen of Qihoo, Arthur Gerkis (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Abdul Aziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), ZhaoWei of KnownSec, Hui Gao of Palo Alto Networks, Royce Lu of Palo Alto Networks, Yuki Chen of Qihoo, AMol NAik (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), exp-sky of NSFOCUS Security Team, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of NSFOCUS Security Team, Jose A. Vazquez of Yenteasy - Security Research (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), Aniway.Anyway@gmail.com (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.A remote server can present a signed Extended Validation (EV) SSL certificate for a wildcard domain to bypass the guidelines that prohibit the use of wildcard domains in EV SSL certificates [CVE-2014-2783]. Eric Lawrence reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2795.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can bypass the guidelines that prohibit the use of wildcard domains in EV SSL certificates.

CVE-2014-2796.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Mulitple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2796.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2774, CVE-2014-2784, CVE-2014-2796, CVE-2014-2808, CVE-2014-2810, CVE-2014-2811, CVE-2014-2818, CVE-2014-2820, CVE-2014-2821, CVE-2014-2822, CVE-2014-2823, CVE-2014-2824, CVE-2014-2825, CVE-2014-2826, CVE-2014-2827, CVE-2014-4050, CVE-2014-4051, CVE-2014-4052, CVE-2014-4055, CVE-2014-4056, CVE-2014-4057, CVE-2014-4058, CVE-2014-4063, CVE-2014-4067, CVE-2014-6354]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user that can exploit another vulnerability can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2014-2817, CVE-2014-2819].One of these privilege escalation vulnerabilities is being actively exploited.AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yujie Wen of Qihoo 360, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of NSFOCUS Security Team, IronRock (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Zeguang Zhao of Team509 and Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Arthur Gerkis (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Zuckerbraun of HP's Zero Day Initiative, Omair (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Wei Wang of VulnHunt reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-2796.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-2799.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Mulitple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-2799.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the XMLDOM ActiveX control and determine valid resources on the target system [CVE-2013-7331]. This can be exploited to detect and avoid anti-malware applications.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2799, CVE-2014-4059, CVE-2014-4065, CVE-2014-4079, CVE-2014-4080, CVE-2014-4081, CVE-2014-4082, CVE-2014-4083, CVE-2014-4084, CVE-2014-4085, CVE-2014-4086, CVE-2014-4087, CVE-2014-4088, CVE-2014-4089, CVE-2014-4090, CVE-2014-4091, CVE-2014-4092, CVE-2014-4093, CVE-2014-4094, CVE-2014-4095, CVE-2014-4096, CVE-2014-4097, CVE-2014-4098, CVE-2014-4099, CVE-2014-4100, CVE-2014-4101, CVE-2014-4102, CVE-2014-4103, CVE-2014-4104, CVE-2014-4105, CVE-2014-4106, CVE-2014-4107, CVE-2014-4108, CVE-2014-4109, CVE-2014-4110, CVE-2014-4111]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Adlab of Venustech, AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 56e7aec02099b976120abfda31254b05 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Zhibin Hu of Qihoo 360, Garage4Hackers (via HP's Zero Day Initiative, A3F2160DCA1BDE70DA1D99ED267D5DC1EC336192 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jason Kratzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), cloudfuzzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), AbdulAziz Hariri of HP's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jose A. CVE-2014-2815.title: Microsoft OneNote File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users
CVE-2014-2815.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft OneNote. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted OneNote file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Eduardo Prado (via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure Program) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2815.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-2816.title: Microsoft SharePoint Lets Remote Users Bypass App Permission Management to Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2816.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted app that, when installed by the target user, will bypass app permission management and execute arbitrary JavaScript on the target user's system with the privileges of the target user.Microsoft SharePoint Server 2013 and Microsoft SharePoint Foundation 2013 are affected.
CVE-2014-2816.extra: A remote user can create an app that, when installed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user that can exploit another vulnerability can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2014-2817, CVE-2014-2819].One of these privilege escalation vulnerabilities is being actively exploited.AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yujie Wen of Qihoo 360, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of NSFOCUS Security Team, IronRock (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Zeguang Zhao of Team509 and Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Arthur Gerkis (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Zuckerbraun of HP's Zero Day Initiative, Omair (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Wei Wang of VulnHunt reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-2824.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2774, CVE-2014-2784, CVE-2014-2796, CVE-2014-2808, CVE-2014-2810, CVE-2014-2811, CVE-2014-2818, CVE-2014-2820, CVE-2014-2821, CVE-2014-2822, CVE-2014-2823, CVE-2014-2824, CVE-2014-2825, CVE-2014-2826, CVE-2014-2827, CVE-2014-4050, CVE-2014-4051, CVE-2014-4052, CVE-2014-4055, CVE-2014-4056, CVE-2014-4057, CVE-2014-4058, CVE-2014-4063, CVE-2014-4067, CVE-2014-6354]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user that can exploit another vulnerability can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2014-2817, CVE-2014-2819].One of these privilege escalation vulnerabilities is being actively exploited.AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yujie Wen of Qihoo 360, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of NSFOCUS Security Team, IronRock (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Zeguang Zhao of Team509 and Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Arthur Gerkis (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Zuckerbraun of HP's Zero Day Initiative, Omair (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Wei Wang of VulnHunt reported these vulnerabilities.

CVE-2014-2827.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Mulitple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-2827.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2774, CVE-2014-2784, CVE-2014-2796, CVE-2014-2808, CVE-2014-2810, CVE-2014-2811, CVE-2014-2818, CVE-2014-2820, CVE-2014-2821, CVE-2014-2822, CVE-2014-2823, CVE-2014-2824, CVE-2014-2825, CVE-2014-2826, CVE-2014-2827, CVE-2014-4050, CVE-2014-4051, CVE-2014-4052, CVE-2014-4055, CVE-2014-4056, CVE-2014-4057, CVE-2014-4058, CVE-2014-4063, CVE-2014-4067, CVE-2014-6354]. CVE-2014-2827.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-2842.title: Juniper ScreenOS SSL/TLS Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2842.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper ScreenOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSL/TLS packet to cause the target device to crash.If the target device is using a HA configuration, a failover will occur.
CVE-2014-2842.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to crash.

CVE-2014-2851.title: Linux Kernel ping_init_sock() Counter Overflow Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-2851.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger a counter overflow in ping_init_sock() and cause the target system to crash.
CVE-2014-2851.extra: A local user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2014-2853.title: MediaWiki Input Validation Flaw in 'includes/actions/InfoAction.php' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2853.body: A vulnerability was reported in MediaWiki. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'includes/actions/InfoAction.php' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'sortKey' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the MediaWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-2853.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the MediaWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2879.title: SonicWALL Email Security Input Validation Flaw in 'License Management' and 'Advanced' Pages Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-2879.body: A vulnerability was reported in SonicWALL Email Security. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'License Management' and 'Advanced' pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the SonicWALL Email Security interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on February 8, 2014.The original advisory is available at:http://www.vulnerability-lab.com/get_content.php?id=1191Benjamin Kunz Mejri of Vulnerability Laboratory Research Team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2879.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the SonicWALL Email Security interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2915.title: Xen ARM Hardware Access Flaw Lets Local Guest Users Deny Service on the Host System
CVE-2014-2915.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on other guests or on the host operating system.A local user on the guest operating system on an ARM-based system can access various hardware features, such as cache control, coprocessors, debug registers, and processor specific registers. This can be exploited to cause other guest systems or the host system to crash and to corrupt data on the system.x86 systems are not affected.Thomas Leonard reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2915.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on other guests or on the host operating system.

CVE-2014-2916.title: PHPlist Input Validation Flaw in 'spageedit' Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-2916.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHPlist. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The '/phplist/admin/?page=spageedit' page do not properly validate requests. A remote user can create a specially crafted page that, when loaded by a target user, will take actions on the target site acting as the target user.The vendor was notified on April 2, 2014.David Sopas reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2916.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-2986.title: Xen GIC Distributor Access Control Flaw Lets Local Users on the Guest Operating System Deny Service on the Host Operating System
CVE-2014-2986.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on a guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.A local user on a guest operating system can access the virtual guest interrupt controller (GIC) distributor to trigger a pointer dereference and cause the hypervisor to crash.ARM systems are affected.x86 systems are not affected.Thomas Leonard reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-2986.extra: A local user on a guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.

CVE-2014-3000.title: FreeBSD TCP Reassembly Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3000.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted packets in a TCP connection to cause the reassembly function to trigger a memory access error and crash the kernel.Jonathan Looney reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3000.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2014-3001.title: FreeBSD Kernel devfs Rule Bypass Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3001.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system does not apply device filesystem (devfs(5)) rule sets by default on boot for jails. A local jailed process can exploit this flaw to gain access to restricted resources on the host system.Systems that do not run jails are not affected.
CVE-2014-3001.extra: A local user can gain access to restricted resources on the host system.

CVE-2014-3024.title: IBM Tivoli Change and Configuration Management Database Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-3024.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Change and Configuration Management Database. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.Jamie Riden of Pen Test Partners reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3024.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3066.title: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager XXE Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Files From the Target System
CVE-2014-3066.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager. A remote user can obtain files from the target system.A remote user can supply a specially crafted XML External Entity data to access files from the target server.
CVE-2014-3066.extra: A remote user can access files from the target server.

CVE-2014-3074.title: IBM AIX Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3074.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM AIX. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit a flaw in the runtime linker. When the MALLOCOPTIONS and MALLOCBUCKETS environment variables are set with bucket statistics options, a local user may be able to create a root owned file with 666 permission.
CVE-2014-3074.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3076.title: IBM Business Process Manager Unprotected JSP Page Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Users
CVE-2014-3076.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Business Process Manager. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can access an unprotected JSP page to obtain system information.
CVE-2014-3076.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3084.title: IBM Tivoli Change and Configuration Management Database Lets Remote Authenticated Users Modify Calendar Entries
CVE-2014-3084.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Change and Configuration Management Database. A remote authenticated user can modify calendar entries without authorization.A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions to modify calendar entries that the user does not have access to.
CVE-2014-3084.extra: A remote authenticated user can modify calendar entries that the user does not have authorized access to.

CVE-2014-3101.title: IBM Rational ClearQuest Web Login Form Error Lets Remote Users Conduct Brute Force Password Guessing Attacks
CVE-2014-3101.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational ClearQuest Web. A remote user can conduct a brute force password guessing attack.A remote user can submit a large number of login requests without restriction. This can be exploited to conduct a brute force password guessing attack and gain access to the target user's account.
CVE-2014-3101.extra: A remote user can conduct a brute force password guessing attack to gain access to the target user's account.

CVE-2014-3102.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Multiple Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting, URL Redirection, and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2014-3102.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-0953, CVE-2014-3102]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can view error codes to identify systems behind the firewall [CVE-2014-4746].A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the target user's browser to redirect to an arbitrary web site [CVE-2014-4760].
CVE-2014-3102.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere Portal software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can cause the target user's browser to redirect to an arbitrary URL.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information about systems behind the firewall.

CVE-2014-3113.title: RealPlayer MP4 Memory Corruption Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3113.body: A vulnerability was reported in RealPlayer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an MP4 file with a specially crafted 'stsz' or 'elst' atom that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://www.fortiguard.com/advisory/RealNetworks-RealPlayer-Memory-Corruption/Dehui Yin of Fortinet's FortiGuard Labs reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3113.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-3115.title: Fortinet FortiWeb Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-3115.body: A vulnerability was reported in Fortinet FortiWeb. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can take actions on the target site acting as the target user.William Costa and Enrique Nissim reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3115.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3124.title: Xen HVMOP_set_mem_type Page Transition Flaw Lets Local Users on the Guest System Cause Denial of Service Conditions on the Host System
CVE-2014-3124.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.A local administrative user on the guest operating system can exploit a flaw in the HVMOP_set_mem_type control operations to transition a page from an invalid memory type, causing denial of service conditions on the target host system.Systems with HVM guests where device models run with limited privilege (e.g., stubdom device models) are affected.Jan Beulich reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3124.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on the host operating system.

CVE-2014-3125.title: Xen CNTKCTL_EL1 Context Switching Flaw Lets Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3125.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest operating system can cause denial of service conditions on other guests or on the host system.The system does not context switch the CNTKCTL_EL1 register. A local user on a guest operating system can exploit this and reconfigure CNTKCTL_EL1 to block userspace access to the timer hardware for arbitrary domains. This may cause the target guest system to crash.ARM systems are affected.x86 systems are not affected.Chen Baozi reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3125.extra: A local user on the guest operating system can cause the target guest or host system to crash.

CVE-2014-3129.title: SAP Software Lifeclycle Manager JSP Pages Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3129.body: A vulnerability was reported in SAP Software Lifeclycle Manager. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can exploit a flaw in SAP Solution Manager version 7.1 to obtain potentially sensitive information via Java Server Pages.The vendor was notified on August 29, 2013.Nahuel D. Sanchez of Onapsis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3129.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

Ltd., Ian Foster, Jack Tang of Trend Micro Inc., Jianjun Dai of Qihoo 360 Skyeye Labs, Jianqiang Zhao and pjf of IceSword Lab, Qihoo 360, Mark Salyzyn of Google, Mike Anderson and Nathan Crandall of Tesla's Product Security Team, Peng Xiao, Chengming Yang, Ning You, Chao Yang, and Yang song of Alibaba Mobile Security Group, Pengfei Ding, Chenfu Bao, and Lenx Wei of Baidu X-Lab, Qidan He of KeenLab, Tencent, Roee Hay of Aleph Research, HCL Technologies, Scott Bauer, Seven Shen of TrendMicro Mobile Threat Research Team, Tim Becker, Uma Sankar Pradhan, V.E.O of Mobile Threat Response Team, Trend Micro, Weichao Sun of Alibaba Inc, Wenlin Yang, Yonggang Guo of IceSword Lab, Qihoo 360 Technology Co. Ltd., Zinuo Han from Chengdu Security Response Center of Qihoo 360 Technology Co. Ltd., and Zubin Mithra of Google reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3145.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.An application can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.An application can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3147.title: Splunk Enterprise HTTP Referer Header Validation Flaw in Splunk Web Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3147.body: A vulnerability was reported in Splunk Enterprise. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Splunk Web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the HTTP Referer header before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Splunk Web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Sanehdeep Singh of ControlCase International Pvt. Ltd reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3147.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Splunk Web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3152.title: Google Chrome Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks, And Spoof the User Interface
CVE-2014-3152.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can spoof the user interface.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.A use-after-free may occur in processing styles [CVE-2014-1743]. cloudfuzzer reported this vulnerability.An integer overflow may occur in processing audio [CVE-2014-1744]. Aaron Staple reported this vulnerability.A use-after-free may occur in SVG [CVE-2014-1745]. Atte Kettunen of OUSPG reported this vulnerability.An out-of-bounds read error may occur in media filters [CVE-2014-1746]. Holger Fuhrmannek reported this vulnerability.A cross-site scripting error may occur in processing a local MHTML file [CVE-2014-1747]. packagesu reported this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a scrollbar flaw to spoof the user interface [CVE-2014-1748]. Jordan Milne reported this vulnerability.Other flaws may occur [CVE-2014-1749].An integer may occur in the v8 engine [CVE-2014-3152].
CVE-2014-3152.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can spoof the user interface.

CVE-2014-3153.title: Linux Kernel PI Futex Requeuing Bug Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3153.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can can exploit a flaw in the requeuing of Priority Inheritance (PI) to PI futexes to gain elevated privileges on the target system.
CVE-2014-3153.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3166.title: Google Chrome Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Information
CVE-2014-3166.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a use-after-free memory error in web sockets [CVE-2014-3165]. Collin Payne reported this vulnerability.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information due to a flaw in SPDY [CVE-2014-3166]. Antoine Delignat-Lavaud reported this vulnerability.Several unspecified flaws exists [CVE-2014-3167].
CVE-2014-3166.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The impact of some vulnerabilities are not specified.

CVE-2014-3170.title: Google Chrome Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Information
CVE-2014-3170.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can trigger a use-after-free in SVG [CVE-2014-3168]. cloudfuzzer reported this vulnerability.A remote user can trigger a use-after-free in DOM [CVE-2014-3169]. Andrzej Dyjak reported this vulnerability.A remote user can spoof the extension permission dialog [CVE-2014-3170]. Rob Wu reported this vulnerability.A remote user can trigger a use-after-free in bindings [CVE-2014-3171]. cloudfuzzer reported this vulnerability.A remote user can trigger a flaw in extension debugging [CVE-2014-3172]. The impact was not specified. Eli Grey reported this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a flaw in WebGL to read uninitialized memory [CVE-2014-3173]. jmuizelaar reported this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit a flaw in WebGL to read uninitialized memory [CVE-2014-3174]. Atte Kettunen from OUSPG reported this vulnerability.A remote user can exploit flaws in the V8 engine, IPC, sync, and extensions to execute arbitrary code outside of the sandbox [CVE-2014-3176, CVE-2014-3177]. lokihardt@asrt reported this vulnerability.Several unspecified flaws exist [CVE-2014-3175].
CVE-2014-3170.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3192.title: Apple Safari WebKit Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3192.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Apple Safari. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption flaw and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.cloudfuzzer, lokihardt@ASRT (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Apple reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3192.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-3214.title: ISC BIND Prefetch Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service Against Recursive Nameservers
CVE-2014-3214.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC BIND. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can trigger a flaw in the prefetch feature and cause the target recursive nameserver to crash.Specially crafted attributes returned in an answer to a remote user's query can trigger this flaw.Authoritative-only servers are not affected.
CVE-2014-3214.extra: A remote user can cause the target nameserver to crash.

CVE-2014-3262.title: Cisco IOS and IOS XE LISP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3262.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted LISP control messages to the target Ingress Tunnel Router (ITR) to disable Cisco Express Forwarding and cause the system to stop passing traffic.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun73782 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3262.extra: A remote user can cause the system to stop processing traffic.

CVE-2014-3263.title: Cisco IOS ScanSafe HTTPS Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3263.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS ScanSafe. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted HTTPS packets that will be redirect to a ScanSafe tower to cause the target device to reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum97038 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3263.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3265.title: Cisco Security Manager Input Validation Flaw in Auto Update Server Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3265.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Security Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Auto Update Server web framework does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Security Manager interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo06900 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3265.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Security Manager interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3267.title: Cisco Security Manager Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-3267.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Security Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The web framework does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will take actions on the Cisco Security Manager interface acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo46427 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3267.extra: A remote user can take actions on the Cisco Security Manager interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3270.title: Cisco IOS XR DHCPv6 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3270.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCP version 6 (DHCPv6) packet to cause the target DHCPv6 server process to stop stop processing DHCPv6 requests.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul80924 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCPv6 packet to cause the target DHCPv6 server process to crash.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCum85558, CSCum20949, CSCul61849, and CSCul71149 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3270.extra: A remote user can cause the target DHCPv6 service to hang or crash.

CVE-2014-3271.title: Cisco IOS XR DHCPv6 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3271.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCP version 6 (DHCPv6) packet to cause the target DHCPv6 server process to stop stop processing DHCPv6 requests.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul80924 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCPv6 packet to cause the target DHCPv6 server process to crash.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCum85558, CSCum20949, CSCul61849, and CSCul71149 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3271.extra: A remote user can cause the target DHCPv6 service to hang or crash.

CVE-2014-3272.title: Cisco Tidal Enterprise Scheduler Agent Input Validation Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3272.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Tidal Enterprise Scheduler. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can exploit an input validation flaw in the Cisco Tidal Enterprise Scheduler Agent to execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.Specially crafted Tidal Job Buffers (TJB) parameters can trigger this flaw.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo33074 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3272.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3273.title: Cisco IOS LLDP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3273.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP) packet to cause the target device to reload.Systems with LLDP enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum96282 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3273.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3274.title: Cisco TelePresence Does Not Always Encrypt Directory Information Transfers
CVE-2014-3274.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco TelePresence. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The system does not enforce HTTPS when transferring directory information between the Cisco TelePresence System (CTS) and the Cisco Unified Communications Manager (Cisco UCM). A remote user monitoring the network can block an HTTPS connection and then monitor the directory information sent via an HTTP connection.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj26326 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3274.extra: A remote user can monitor directory information transferred between the Cisco TelePresence System (CTS) and the Cisco Unified Communications Manager (Cisco UCM).

CVE-2014-3275.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2014-3275.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Identity Services Engine. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul21337 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3275.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-3276.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine RADIUS Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3276.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Identity Services Engine. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) packets to trigger a deadlock and cause the target RADIUS service to become unresponsive.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo56780 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3276.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target RADIUS service to become unresponsive.

CVE-2014-3277.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3277.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager. A remote or remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary web site.A remote authenticated user with Location Administrator privileges can submit a specially crafted URL to obtain information about users and user groups [CVE-2014-3277]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum77005 to this vulnerability.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to determine valid user accounts [CVE-2014-3279]. The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCun39631 and CSCun39643 to this vulnerability.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to access certain user information [CVE-2014-3280]. The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCun46045 and CSCun46116 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user with Location Administrator privileges can submit a specially crafted URL to access information about number translation [CVE-2014-3282]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum76930 to this vulnerability.A remote user can inject HTTP header values via a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by the target user, will redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary web site [CVE-2014-3283]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun79731 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3277.extra: A remote or remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary web site.

CVE-2014-3284.title: Cisco IOS XE ASR1000 PPPoE Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3284.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XE on the ASR1000. A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted Point-to-Point Protocol over Ethernet (PPPoE) packet to cause the target IOS XE ASR1000 device to reload. Devices configured with PPPoE termination are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo55180 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3284.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-3285.title: Cisco Wide Area Application Services SharePoint Acceleration Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3285.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Wide Area Application Services. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create a specially crafted SharePoint application that, when loaded by the target user, will cause the application optimization handler to reload.Systems configured with the SharePoint acceleration feature are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCue47674 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3285.extra: A remote user can cause the target application optimization handler to reload.

CVE-2014-3287.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw in 'BulkViewFileContentsAction.java' Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2014-3287.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The 'BulkViewFileContentsAction.java' component does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo17337 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3287.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-3289.title: Cisco Email Security Appliance Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3289.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Email Security Appliance (IronPort). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCun07998 (for Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA)), CSCun07844 (for Cisco Web Security Appliance (WSA)), and CSCun07888 (for Cisco Content Security Management Appliance (SMA)) to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3289.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3290.title: Cisco IOS XE mDNS Bug Lets Remote Users Read or Modify Autonomic Networking Services
CVE-2014-3290.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XE. A remote user on the local network can read or modify autonomic networking service data.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted multicast Domain Name System (mDNS) data to overwrite autonomic networking services on the target system.A remote user on the local network can also monitor the network to obtain mDNS data.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun64867 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3290.extra: A remote user on the local network can read or modify autonomic networking service data.

CVE-2014-3291.title: Cisco Wireless LAN Controller CDP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3291.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Wireless LAN Controller. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Cisco Discovery Protocol requests and then cause the target user to initiate an SNMP poll of the target MIB to trigger a null pointer error and cause the target service to restart.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo12321 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3291.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause the target service to restart.

CVE-2014-3292.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw in Real-Time Monitoring Tool (RTMT) Lets Remote Authenticated Users Delete or Download Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-3292.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can download or delete arbitrary files from the target system.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted URL to exploit a flaw in the Real-Time Monitoring Tool (RTMT) and download or delete arbitrary files from arbitrary locations on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuo17302 and CSCuo17199 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3292.extra: A remote authenticated user can download or delete arbitrary files from the target system.

CVE-2014-3293.title: Cisco ASR 901 Series Aggregation Router IPv4 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3293.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASR 901 Series Router. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a flood of specially crafted IPv4 packets to the target ASR 901 router to cause the CPU to process the packets, resulting in BGP neighbor flaps.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo29736 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3293.extra: A remote user can cause BGP neighbor flaps.

CVE-2014-3294.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server URLs Disclose Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2014-3294.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can view application URL requests that contain potentially sensitive information in the URL parameters.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81691 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3294.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3295.title: Cisco NX-OS HSRP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3295.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Hot Standby Router Protocol (HSRP) authentication data to bypass authentication and cause active HSRP group members to enter the 'SPEAK' state. As a result, traffic will be black holed.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup11309 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3295.extra: A remote user can cause HSRP group member traffic to be black holed.

CVE-2014-3297.title: Cisco Cloud Portal Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2014-3297.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Cloud Portal. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can view sensitive information in application URL requests.The MyServices action of Cisco Intelligent Automation for Cloud is affected.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCui36937, CSCui37004, CSCui36927 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3297.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3299.title: Cisco IOS IPSec Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3299.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted IPsec packets to cause the target device to reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCui79745 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3299.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3300.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager Bugs Let Remote Users Access the System and Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3300.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager. A remote user can gain root access on the target system. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can access and modify settings.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted URL to trigger a flaw in the Administration interface and change the administrative credentials of an arbitrary user [CVE-2014-2197]. This can be exploited to gain elevated privileges.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun49862 to this vulnerability. Fatih Ozavci from Sense of Security reported this vulnerability.The system uses a default SSH private key that is stored in an non-secure manner [CVE-2014-2198]. A remote user can obtain the SSH private key and use the key to login to the target system with root privileges. The key may be obtained, for example, by reverse engineering the binary file of the operating system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCud41130 to this vulnerability.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to access and modify BVSMWeb portal user information (e.g., personal phone directory settings, speed dials, Single Number Reach, call forward settings) [CVE-2014-3300]. Fatih Ozavci from Sense of Security reported this vulnerability.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum77041 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3300.extra: A remote user can gain root access on the target system.A remote authenticated user can obtain administrative privileges on the target system.A remote user can access and modify settings (e.g., personal phone directory settings, speed dials, Single Number Reach, call forward settings).

CVE-2014-3301.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server ProfileAction Controller Lets Remote Users Obtain Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3301.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can submit specially crafted URL requests to trigger a stack trace flaw in the ProfileAction controller and view sensitive information.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81700 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3301.extra: A remote user can view sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3302.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server Invalid Token Timer Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3302.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can exploit an invalid token timer flaw in 'user.php' to view sensitive information.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81708 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3302.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3303.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server URLs Disclose Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2014-3303.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote authenticated user can view application URL requests that contain potentially sensitive information in the URL parameters.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81713 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3303.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3304.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server OutlookAction Class Lets Remote Users Determine Valid User Account Names
CVE-2014-3304.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can determine user account names.A remote user can send specially crafted URL requests to trigger a flaw in the OutlookAction Class and determine valid user account names on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81722 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3304.extra: A remote user can determine valid user account names.

CVE-2014-3305.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-3305.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The web framework code does not properly validate user-supplied requests. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will take actions on the target site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj81735 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3305.extra: A remote user can take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3306.title: Cisco Wireless Residential Gateway Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3306.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Wireless Residential Gateway. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the target device to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup40808 to this vulnerability.The following models are affected:Cisco DPC3825 8x4 DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Residential GatewayCisco EPC3825 8x4 DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Residential GatewayCisco Model DPC3925 8x4 DOCSIS 3.0 with Wireless Residential Gateway with EDVACisco Model DPQ3925 8x4 DOCSIS 3.0 Wireless Residential Gateway with EDVACisco Model EPC3925 8x4 DOCSIS 3.0 with Wireless Residential Gateway with EDVAChris Watts of Tech Analysis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3306.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-3306.title: Cisco Cable Modem Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3306.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Cable Modem. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send a specially crafted HTTP request to the target device to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup40808 to this vulnerability.The following models are affected:Cisco DPC3212 VoIP Cable ModemCisco EPC3212 VoIP Cable ModemCisco Model DPC3010 DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 Cable ModemCisco Model EPC3010 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable ModemChris Watts of Tech Analysis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3306.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-3308.title: Cisco ASR 9000 Series Router IOS XR Punt Policer Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3308.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ISO XR on ASR 9000 Series Router. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a large number of specially crafted packets to the target device to trigger a flaw in the punt policer implementation on Trident line cards to overload the card's CPU or the Route Processor CPU and deny service for some traffic queues.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun83985 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3308.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions for some traffic queues.

CVE-2014-3309.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE NTP Group Access Controls Can Be Bypassed By Remote Users
CVE-2014-3309.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can bypass access controls to query the NTP server.The ntp access-group command contains a flaw that allows a remote user to bypass the configured Network Time Protocol (NTP) access group and query the target NTP server.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj66318 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3309.extra: A remote user can bypass access controls to query the target NTP server.

CVE-2014-3310.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server and WebEx Meeting Center File Transfer Bug Lets Remote Users Download Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-3310.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server and WebEx Meeting Center. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the File Transfer function of the Cisco WebEx Meetings client to access arbitrary files the target user's system.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCup62442 (Cisco WebEx Meetings Server) and CSCup58463 (Cisco WebEx Meeting Center) to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3310.extra: A remote user can download arbitrary files from the target user's system.

CVE-2014-3311.title: Cisco WebEx Meetings Server and WebEx Meeting Center Heap Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3311.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx Meetings Server and WebEx Meeting Center. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can exploit a buffer overflow in the file sharing function of the Cisco WebEx Meetings client to execute arbitrary code on the target system.The vendor has issued bug IDs CSCup62463 (Cisco WebEx Meetings Server) and CSCup58467 (Cisco WebEx Meeting Center) to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3311.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-3312.title: Cisco Small Business SPA300/SPA500 IP Phones Authentication Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3312.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Small Business SPA300/SPA500 IP Phones. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can send specially crafted commands to exploit an authentication flaw in the debug console to access the debug shell and file system on the target phone. The user can execute arbitrary commands and access system memory with elevated privileges.The Cisco Small Business SPA300 and SPA500 series phones are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun77435 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3312.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3313.title: Cisco Small Business SPA300/SPA500 IP Phones Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3313.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Small Business SPA300/SPA500 IP Phones. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web user interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco IP Phone web user interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The Cisco Small Business SPA300 and SPA500 series phones are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo52582 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3313.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco IP Phone web user interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3316.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Upload, Delete, and Download Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-3316.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted parameter values to upload arbitrary files to a restricted location on the target system [CVE-2014-3316]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76297 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to delete files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3317]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76314 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3318]. The vulnerability resides in the '/dna/viewfilecontents.do' of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76318 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3319]. The vulnerability resides in the Real-Time Monitoring Tool (RTMT). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup57676 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3316.extra: A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.

CVE-2014-3317.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Upload, Delete, and Download Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-3317.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted parameter values to upload arbitrary files to a restricted location on the target system [CVE-2014-3316]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76297 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to delete files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3317]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76314 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3318]. The vulnerability resides in the '/dna/viewfilecontents.do' of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76318 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3319]. The vulnerability resides in the Real-Time Monitoring Tool (RTMT). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup57676 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3317.extra: A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.

CVE-2014-3318.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted parameter values to upload arbitrary files to a restricted location on the target system [CVE-2014-3316]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76297 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to delete files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3317]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76314 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3318]. The vulnerability resides in the '/dna/viewfilecontents.do' of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76318 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3319]. The vulnerability resides in the Real-Time Monitoring Tool (RTMT). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup57676 to this vulnerability.
