CVE-2014-3319.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaws Let Remote Authenticated Users Upload, Delete, and Download Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-3319.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted parameter values to upload arbitrary files to a restricted location on the target system [CVE-2014-3316]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76297 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to delete files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3317]. The vulnerability resides in the Multiple Analyzer of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76314 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3318]. The vulnerability resides in the '/dna/viewfilecontents.do' of the Dialed Number Analyzer (DNA). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup76318 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted URL requests to view files from arbitrary locations on the target system [CVE-2014-3319]. The vulnerability resides in the Real-Time Monitoring Tool (RTMT). The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup57676 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3319.extra: A remote authenticated user can upload, delete, and download arbitrary files.

CVE-2014-3321.title: Cisco ASR 9000 Series IOS XR Router MPLS Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3321.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ISO XR on ASR 9000 Series Router. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send a stream of specially crafted Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) packets to cause the target network processor chip and traffic processing line card to lockup and reload.The vendor has assigned CSCuo91149 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3321.extra: A remote user can cause the target network processor chip and traffic processing line card to lockup and reload.

CVE-2014-3322.title: Cisco ASR 9000 Series IOS XR Router NetFlow Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3322.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ISO XR on ASR 9000 Series Routers. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted IPv4 or IPv6 packets to trigger a NetFlow sampling flaw and cause the target Network Processor (NP) chip and a line card processing traffic to lock up and reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo68417 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3322.extra: A remote user can cause the target network processor chip and traffic processing line card to lockup and reload.

CVE-2014-3323.title: Cisco Unified Contact Center Enterprise Lets Remote Authenticated Users View Files in the Web Directory
CVE-2014-3323.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Contact Center Enterprise. A remote authenticated user can view files in the web root directory.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted URL to exploit a directory traversal flaw in the web interface and view files in the web root directory.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun25262 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3323.extra: A remote authenticated user can view files in the web root directory.

CVE-2014-3324.title: Cisco TelePresence Server Input Validation Flaw in Web Interface Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3324.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco TelePresence Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The administrative web interface login page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco TelePresence Server web interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup90060 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3324.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco TelePresence Server web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3326.title: Cisco Security Manager Input Validation Flaw in Web Framework Code Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2014-3326.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Security Manager. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The web framework code does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup26957 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3326.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-3327.title: Cisco IOS and IOS XE EnergyWise Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3327.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted EnergyWise packet to port 43440 on the target device to cause the target device to reload.Systems configured for EnergyWise operation are affected.Cisco IOS XR is not affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup52101 to this vulnerability.Ayhan Koca and Matthias Luft of ERNW GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3327.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3329.title: Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3329.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum86620 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3329.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Prime Data Center Network Manager interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3330.title: Cisco NX-OS Nexus 9000 Access List Logging Bug Lets Remote Users Bypass Access Control Lists
CVE-2014-3330.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS Nexus 9000 Switches. A remote user can bypass access control lists.A remote user can send a flood of packets that will be denied by the switch and logged due to an access list entry. A small percentage of the packets will bypass the access control list instead of being dropped.No bug ID number was provided.
CVE-2014-3330.extra: A remote user can bypass access control lists.

CVE-2014-3331.title: Cisco ASR Router Packet Data Network Gateway Session Manager Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3331.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASR 5000 Series Routers. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted TCP packet to cause the target Packet Data Network Gateway (PGW) Session Manager service to crash.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo21914 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3331.extra: A remote user can cause the target Session Manager service to crash.

CVE-2014-3333.title: Cisco Unity Connection Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3333.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unity Connection. A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote authenticated user can read files on the target system with the privileges of the web service and then gain elevated privileges on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup41014 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3333.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3335.title: Cisco ASR 9000 Series IOS XR Router Packet Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3335.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco ASR 9000 Series Routers. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the adjacent network can send a specially crafted packet with a multicast destination MAC address through a target device configured with NetFlow sampling to trigger a flaw in the packet parsing code and cause the target Network Processor chip and line card to lockup and reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup77750 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3335.extra: A remote user on the adjacent network can the target line card to reload.

CVE-2014-3336.title: Cisco Unity Connection Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2014-3336.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unity Connection. A remote user can inject SQL commands.The web server does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database. This can be exploited to read a subset of the data stored in the database.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq31016 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3336.extra: A remote user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database to read a subset of the data stored in the database.

CVE-2014-3337.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager SIP XML Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3337.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user on a registered endpoint can send specially crafted XML data via SIP to cause the target process to crash.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtq76428 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3337.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.

CVE-2014-3338.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Kerberos SSO Token Processing Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Commands
CVE-2014-3338.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted Kerberos single sign-on (SSO) token data to exploit a flaw in the CTIManager module and execute arbitrary commands with elevated privileges.Systems with the Cisco CTIManager enabled and configured for single sign-on are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum95491 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3338.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system.

CVE-2014-3340.title: Cisco WebEx MeetMeNow Server Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users View Files
CVE-2014-3340.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco WebEx MeetMeNow Server. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.The system does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request to view files on target system with the privileges of the Apache service account.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo16166 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3340.extra: A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system with the privileges of the Apache service account.

CVE-2014-3341.title: Cisco NX-OS Nexus 5000/6000 SNMP Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3341.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS Nexus 5000 and 6000 Series routers. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can send a large number of Simple Network Management Protocol (SNMP) requests to determine VLAN IDs for VLANs configured on the system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup85616 to this vulnerability.Ehab Hussein of IOActive reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3341.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive VLAN information.

CVE-2014-3343.title: Cisco IOS XR DHCPv6 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3343.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted DHCPv6 packet to cause the target DHCPv6 service to crash.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo59052 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3343.extra: A remote user can cause the target DHCPv6 service to crash.

CVE-2014-3344.title: Cisco Transport Gateway Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3344.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Smart Call Home Transport Gateway. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Transport Gateway software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuq31129, CSCuq31134, CSCuq31137, and CSCuq31563 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3344.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco Transport Gateway software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3345.title: Cisco Transport Gateway Access Control Flaw Lets Remote Users Modify the Configuration
CVE-2014-3345.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Transport Gateway. A remote user can modify the configuration.The system does not properly apply access controls to certain administrative web pages. A remote user can submit a specially crafted URL to make changes to the system configuration.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq31503 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3345.extra: A remote user can modify the configuration.

CVE-2014-3346.title: Cisco Transport Gateway Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3346.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Transport Gateway. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted parameter string to cause the target Transport Gateway for Smart Call Home (TG-SCH) service to crash.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq31819 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3346.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-3347.title: Cisco 1800 Series Integrated Services Router ISDN Timing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Services
CVE-2014-3347.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco 1800 Series Integrated Services Router. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems with the Integrated Services for Digital Network (ISDN) Basic Rate Interface (BRI) configured and connected to a public switched network, a remote user with knowledge of the target ISDN phone number can exploit a flaw in the hardware entropy collection module can cause denial of service conditions.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul77897 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3347.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-3348.title: Cisco Unified Computing System E-Series Blade Servers SSH Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3348.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Computing System E-Series Blade Servers. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted SSH packet to the SSH service on the target Cisco Integrated Management Controller (Cisco IMC) to cause the Cisco IMC to become unresponsive.The operating system running on the target blade is not affected.The Cisco IMC cannot be restarted from the IOS command line interface or via IPMI.To return the system to normal operation, the target E-Series Server likely must be restarted by switching the blade's power switch or by restarting the ISR G2 router that the device is installed in. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo69206 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3348.extra: A remote user can cause the target Cisco IMC to become unresponsive.

CVE-2014-3349.title: Cisco Cloud Portal Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Upload Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-3349.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Cloud Portal. A remote authenticated user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.A remote authenticated user can submit a specially crafted file to exploit a file type input validation flaw to upload arbitrary files to the target device.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh87410 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3349.extra: A remote authenticated user can upload arbitrary files to the target system.

CVE-2014-3350.title: Cisco Cloud Portal Input Validation Flaw Permits URL Redirection Attacks
CVE-2014-3350.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Cloud Portal. A remote user can conduct URL redirection attacks.A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary site. This can be exploited to obtain potentially sensitive information.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh84870 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3350.extra: A remote user can redirect the target user's browser to an arbitrary site to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3351.title: Cisco Cloud Portal Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Users
CVE-2014-3351.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Cloud Portal. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can supply specially crafted packets to trigger a flaw in checking for certain null sessions and enumerate potentially sensitive information.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCuh87398 and CSCuh87380 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3351.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3352.title: Cisco Cloud Portal Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Remote Users
CVE-2014-3352.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Cloud Portal. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can supply specially crafted packets to trigger a flaw in checking for certain null sessions and obtain potentially sensitive information.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuh84801 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3352.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3353.title: Cisco IOS XR for Carrier Routing System IPv6 Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3353.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Carrier Routing System. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted IPv6 packet to trigger a flaw in the Cisco IOS XR for the Cisco Carrier Routing System (CRS) IPv6 library and consume excessive CPU resources on the target line card. This may cause certain IPv6 traffic to the target device to be dropped.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo95165 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3353.extra: A remote user can cause certain IPv6 traffic to the target device to be dropped.

CVE-2014-3354.title: Cisco IOS RSVP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3354.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems configured with the Resource Reservation (RSVP) protocol, a remote user can send specially crafted IPv4 or IPv6 RSVP packets via UDP port 1698 to or through the target device to cause the target device to reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCui11547 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3354.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to reload.

CVE-2014-3355.title: Cisco IOS RSVP Flow Metadata Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3355.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted RSVP traffic via IP protocol 46 and IP protocol 134 through the target device to trigger a flaw in processing RSVP flow metadata and cause the target device to crash.Systems configured with the metadata flow feature are affected.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCue22753 (CVE-2014-3356) and CSCug75942 (CVE-2014-3355) to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3355.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3356.title: Cisco IOS RSVP Flow Metadata Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3356.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted RSVP traffic via IP protocol 46 and IP protocol 134 through the target device to trigger a flaw in processing RSVP flow metadata and cause the target device to crash.Systems configured with the metadata flow feature are affected.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCue22753 (CVE-2014-3356) and CSCug75942 (CVE-2014-3355) to these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3356.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3357.title: Cisco IOS mDNS Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3357.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted multicast Domain Name System (mDNS) packets to the target device to trigger a memory leak and cause an interface queue wedge or cause the target device to reload [CVE-2014-3358]. Specially crafted UDP packets sent via IPv4 or IPv6 on port 5353 to the unicast address of any interface configured on a device, IPv4 multicast address 224.0.0.251, or IPv6 multicast address FF02::FB can trigger this flaw.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj58950 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted mDNS packets to the target device to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target device to reload [CVE-2014-3357]. Specially crafted UDP packets sent via IPv4 or IPv6 on port 5353 to the unicast address of any interface configured on a device, IPv4 multicast address 224.0.0.251, or IPv6 multicast address FF02::FB can trigger this flaw.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul90866 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3357.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3358.title: Cisco IOS mDNS Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3358.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted multicast Domain Name System (mDNS) packets to the target device to trigger a memory leak and cause an interface queue wedge or cause the target device to reload [CVE-2014-3358]. Specially crafted UDP packets sent via IPv4 or IPv6 on port 5353 to the unicast address of any interface configured on a device, IPv4 multicast address 224.0.0.251, or IPv6 multicast address FF02::FB can trigger this flaw.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuj58950 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted mDNS packets to the target device to trigger an input validation flaw and cause the target device to reload [CVE-2014-3357]. Specially crafted UDP packets sent via IPv4 or IPv6 on port 5353 to the unicast address of any interface configured on a device, IPv4 multicast address 224.0.0.251, or IPv6 multicast address FF02::FB can trigger this flaw.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul90866 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3358.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3359.title: Cisco IOS DHCPv6 Memory Leak Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3359.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted DHCPv6 packets to the target device to trigger a memory leak and cause the target device to reload.Packets sent to the link-scoped multicast address ff02::1:2 (All_DHCP_Relay_Agents_and_Servers) and to the IPv6 unicast address of the DHCPv6 server can trigger the memory leak.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum90081 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3359.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3360.title: Cisco IOS SIP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3360.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS and IOS XE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) messages to the target device to cause the target device to reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCul46586 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3360.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3361.title: Cisco IOS NAT SIP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3361.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) messages through the target device via IPv4 to cause the target device to reload.Systems configured for network address translation (NAT) of multipart SDP traffic and for multipart SDP in SIP on the application-layer gateway are affected.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun54071 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3361.extra: A remote user can cause the target device to reload.

CVE-2014-3363.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw in Web Framework Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3363.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web framework code does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target authenticated user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Unified Communications Manager interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq68443 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3363.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Cisco Unified Communications Manager interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3365.title: Cisco Prime Security Manager Input Validation Flaw in Dashboard and Configure Realm Pages Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3365.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Security Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Dashboard and Configure Realm pages do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Cisco Prime Security Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo94808 to this vulnerability.

CVE-2014-3366.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Inject SQL Commands
CVE-2014-3366.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote authenticated user can inject SQL commands.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted parameter value to execute SQL commands on the underlying database.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCup88089 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3366.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute SQL commands on the underlying database.

CVE-2014-3367.title: Cisco NX-OS Nexus 1000V Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3367.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco NX-OS Nexus 1000V. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The VMware vCloud Director of the Cisco Nexus 1000V does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the vCloud Director interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq90524 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3367.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Cisco NX-OS software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3368.title: Cisco TelePresence VCS and Expressway Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3368.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server (VCS) and Cisco Expressway. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted IP packets at a high rate to cause the target system to crash and reload [CVE-2014-3368].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCui06507 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted Session Description Protocol (SDP) to the target system when the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) IX Channel filter is configured to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2014-3369].The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo42252 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send specially crafted SIP packets to cause the target device to reload [CVE-2014-3370].The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCum60442 and CSCum60447 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3368.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash and reload.

CVE-2014-3369.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server (VCS) and Cisco Expressway. CVE-2014-3369.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash and reload.

CVE-2014-3370.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server (VCS) and Cisco Expressway. CVE-2014-3372.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager Input Validation Flaw in Reports Interface Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3372.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The CCM reports interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Cisco Unified Communications Manager interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq90589 to this vulnerability.

CVE-2014-3373.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Manager. CVE-2014-3376.title: Cisco IOS XR Packet Processing Flaws Let Remote and Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3376.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted RSVP packet to cause the target RSVP process to reload [CVE-2014-3376]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq12031 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SNMPv2 packet to cause the target snmpd process to reload [CVE-2014-3377]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun67791 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted TACACS+ packet to cause the target TACACS+ process to reload [CVE-2014-3378]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum00468 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted MPLS packet to the target Cisco Network Convergence System 6000 Series Router to cause a network processor unit and line card to lockup and reload [CVE-2014-3379]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq10466 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3376.extra: A remote or remote authenticated user can cause the target process to reload.

The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq12031 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SNMPv2 packet to cause the target snmpd process to reload [CVE-2014-3377]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun67791 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted TACACS+ packet to cause the target TACACS+ process to reload [CVE-2014-3378]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum00468 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted MPLS packet to the target Cisco Network Convergence System 6000 Series Router to cause a network processor unit and line card to lockup and reload [CVE-2014-3379]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq10466 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3378.extra: A remote or remote authenticated user can cause the target process to reload.

CVE-2014-3379.title: Cisco IOS XR Packet Processing Flaws Let Remote and Remote Authenticated Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3379.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Cisco IOS XR. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote authenticated user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted RSVP packet to cause the target RSVP process to reload [CVE-2014-3376]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq12031 to this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can send a specially crafted SNMPv2 packet to cause the target snmpd process to reload [CVE-2014-3377]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCun67791 to this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted TACACS+ packet to cause the target TACACS+ process to reload [CVE-2014-3378]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCum00468 to this vulnerability.A remote user on the local network can send a specially crafted MPLS packet to the target Cisco Network Convergence System 6000 Series Router to cause a network processor unit and line card to lockup and reload [CVE-2014-3379]. The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuq10466 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3379.extra: A remote or remote authenticated user can cause the target process to reload.

CVE-2014-3380.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager TCP Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3380.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted TCP packets at a high rate to consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCuo42063 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3380.extra: A remote user can consume excessive CPU resources on the target system.

CVE-2014-3397.title: Cisco TelePresence MCU TCP Stack Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3397.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco TelePresence MCU. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted sequence of TCP packets to consume all available memory and cause the system to become unstable and reload.The vendor has assigned bug ID CSCtz35468 to this vulnerability.The following models are affected:Cisco TelePresence MCU 4200 SeriesCisco TelePresence MCU 4500 SeriesCisco TelePresence MCU MSE 8420
CVE-2014-3397.extra: A remote user can consume all available memory, causing the system to become unstable and reload.

CVE-2014-3409.title: Cisco IOS/IOS XE Bug in Ethernet Connectivity Fault Management Code Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3409.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco IOS/IOS XE. A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the adjacent network can send specially crafted Ethernet Connectivity Fault Management (CFM) packets to the target device to cause the target device to reload.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCur49659 and CSCuq93406 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3409.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-3431.title: Symantec Encryption Desktop for OS X Installation File Permissions Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3431.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Encryption Desktop for OS X. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The software creates some temporary files with world-writable permissions during product installation. A local user can conduct a symbolic link (symlink) attack to read, write, or create files with the privileges of the target user.Aaron Sigel reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3431.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3432.title: Symantec Data Insight Input Validation Flaw in Management Console Permits Cross-Site Scripting and HTML Injection Attacks
CVE-2014-3432.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Data Insight. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting and HTML injection attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-3432, CVE-2014-3433]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Symantec Data Insight management console and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 2am Research team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3432.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Symantec Data Insight management console, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3433.title: Symantec Data Insight Input Validation Flaw in Management Console Permits Cross-Site Scripting and HTML Injection Attacks
CVE-2014-3433.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Data Insight. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting and HTML injection attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-3432, CVE-2014-3433]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Symantec Data Insight management console and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 2am Research team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3433.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Symantec Data Insight management console, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3436.title: Symantec Encryption Desktop (PGP) Compressed File Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3436.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Encryption Desktop (PGP). A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted compressed email message to cause the target client to consume excessive CPU and memory resources.Alexander Klink, n.runs professionals GmbH, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3436.extra: A remote user can cause the target client consume excessive CPU and memory resources.

CVE-2014-3438.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting, XML External Entity Injection, and File Ovevwrite Attacks
CVE-2014-3438.body: Several vulnerability was reported in Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information. A remote user can overwrite files on the target system.The management console does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-3438]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager console and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the ConsoleServlet logging component to overwrite the log file and possibly other files, causing denial of service conditions or leading to remote user access [CVE-2014-3439].A remote user can supply XML data with a specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) reference to obtain potentially sensitive information from the server [CVE-2014-3437].Stefan Viehbock with SEC Consult Vulnerability Lab reported several vulnerabilities. Inaki Rodriguez (@virtualminds_es) reported one vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3438.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager console, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can overwrite files on the target system.

CVE-2014-3460.title: Novell Sentinel Agent Manager NQMcsVarSet ActiveX Control Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3460.body: A vulnerability was reported in Novell Sentinel Agent Manager. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the NQMcsVarSet ActiveX control and exploit a directory traversal flaw in the DumpToFile() method to write files and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.The CLSID of the vulnerable control is: B4B7CF9E-AD9E-11D8-AE3B-005056C00008The vendor was notified on September 4, 2013.The original advisory is available at:http://zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-14-134/Andrea Micalizzi, aka rgod, reported this vulnerability (via HP's Zero Day Initiative).
CVE-2014-3460.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-3466.title: GnuTLS Server Hello Session ID Buffer Overflow Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3466.body: A vulnerability was reported in GnuTLS. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote server can return a specially crafted Server Hello session ID value to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target client system.The vulnerability resides in the read_server_hello() and _gnutls_read_server_hello() functions in the 'session_id_len' parameter.
CVE-2014-3466.extra: A remote server can execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-3481.title: Red Hat JBoss XML External Entity Expansion Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3481.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat JBoss. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can conduct an XML eXternal Entity (XXE) attack by supplying specially crafted XML data to cause the target 'org.jboss.as.jaxrs.deployment.JaxrsIntegrationProcessor' component to return potentially sensitive information from files on the target system.The Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform QE team reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3481.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2014-3485.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager XXE Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Files on the Target System
CVE-2014-3485.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager. A remote authenticated user can obtain files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) data to the ovirt-engine REST API to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target ovirt-engine JBoss serverDavid Jorm of Red Hat Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3485.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain files on the target system.

CVE-2014-3493.title: Samba smbd and nmbd Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3493.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Samba. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to cause the target nmbd service to enter an infinite loop and consume excessive CPU resources and stop the NetBIOS name service [CVE-2014-0244].A Red Hat user reported this vulnerability.A remote authenticated user can submit a non-unicode request for a valid unicode path name to trigger a memory overwrite error and cause the smbd service to crash [CVE-2014-3493].Simon Arlott reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3493.extra: A remote user can cause excessive CPU consumption on the target system.A remote authenticated user can cause the smbd service to crash.

CVE-2014-3506.title: OpenSSL Bugs Let Remote Users Deny Service, Obtain Information, and Potentially Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3506.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A user can obtain potentially sensitive information.Applications using OpenSSL that print may leak some stack contents to the application [CVE-2014-3508]. The OpenSSL client and server are not affected. Ivan Fratric (Google) reported this vulnerability on June 19, 2014.A remote server can send a specially crafted ec point format extension to the target multithreaded client via a resumed session to trigger a race condition in ssl_parse_serverhello_tlsext and write to freed memory [CVE-2014-3509]. Version 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 clients are affected. Gabor Tyukasz (LogMeIn Inc) reported this vulnerability on July 8, 2014.A remote user can send specially crafted DTLS packets to trigger a double free memory error and deny service on the target system [CVE-2014-3505]. Adam Langley and Wan-Teh Chang (Google) reported this vulnerability on June 6, 2014.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a DTLS handshake processing flaw and consume excessive memory resources on the target system [CVE-2014-3506]. Adam Langley (Google) reported this vulnerability on June 6, 2014.A remote user can send specially crafted zero-length DTLS fragments to trigger a memory leak [CVE-2014-3507]. Adam Langley (Google) reported this vulnerability on June 6, 2014.A remote server can specify an anonymous EC(DH) ciphersuite to trigger a null pointer dereference in the target DTLS client and cause the client to crash [CVE-2014-3510]. Felix Grobert (Google) reported this vulnerability on July 18, 2014.A remote user in a privileged network position can cause a target user's ClientHello message to be fragmented to trigger a flaw in the server code and force a downgrade to TLS 1.0 [CVE-2014-3511]. Version 1.0.1 is affected. David Benjamin and Adam Langley (Google) reported this vulnerability on July 21, 2014.A remote user can send specially crafted SRP data to trigger a buffer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-3512]. Version 1.0.1 is affected. Sean Devlin and Watson Ladd (Cryptography Services, NCCGroup) reported this vulnerability on July 31, 2014.
CVE-2014-3506.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the stack.

CVE-2014-3513.title: OpenSSL SRTP and Session Ticket Memory Leaks Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3513.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted handshake message to trigger a memory leak in the DTLS SRTP extension parsing code and cause the target service to fail to free up to 64k of memory [CVE-2014-3513]. Server versions 1.0.1 are affected. Systems are affected even if not configured for SRTP. Systems compiled with OPENSSL_NO_SRTP defined are not affected.The vendor was notified on September 26, 2014.The LibreSSL project reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted session ticket to cause the target service to fail to free memory [CVE-2014-3567].The vendor was notified on October 8, 2014.
CVE-2014-3513.extra: A remote user can cause excessive memory consumption on the target system.

CVE-2014-3530.title: Red Hat JBoss XXE Bug Lets Remote Users Obtain Files on the Target System
CVE-2014-3530.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat JBoss. A remote user can obtain files on the target system.A remote user can supply specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) data to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target JBoss server.The vulnerability resides in the org.picketlink.common.util.DocumentUtil.getDocumentBuilderFactory() method.Alexander Papadakis reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3530.extra: A remote user can obtain files on the target system.

CVE-2014-3534.title: Linux Kernel s390 Ptrace Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3534.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.On s390-based systems, the PSW mask check of the PTRACE_POKEUSR_AREA command is incorrect. A local user can exploit this flaw to gain read or write access to kernel memory.Martin Schwidefsky of IBM reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3534.extra: A local user can read or write to kernel memory to potentially obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3559.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Snapshot Deletion Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3559.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The oVirt storage back end does not properly erase memory snapshots when deleting VMs, even if wipe-after-delete is enabled. A remote authenticated user with privileges to create a new VM can exploit this flaw to obtain the contents of memory snapshots on an uninitialized storage volume.Idan Shaby and Allon Mureinik of Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3559.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information from memory snapshots on uninitialized storage volume.

CVE-2014-3560.title: Samba Heap Overflow in nmbd NetBIOS Name Services Daemon Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3560.body: A vulnerability was reported in Samba. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted packets to trigger a heap overflow in the target nmbd NetBIOS name services daemon and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with root privileges.Volker Lendecke of SerNet reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3560.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with root privileges.

CVE-2014-3561.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Log Collector Lets Local Users View the Database Password
CVE-2014-3561.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Log Collector. A local user can obtain the database password.The rhevm-log-collector utility supplies the PostgreSQL database password as a command line parameter when running the 'sosreport' utility. A local user that is monitoring a process listing may be able to view the password.David Jorm of Red Hat Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3561.extra: A local user can obtain the database password.

CVE-2014-3566.title: Cisco TelePresence SSL 3.0 Protocol Downgrade Flaw Lets Remote Users Decrypt SSL Traffic
CVE-2014-3566.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco TelePresence. A remote user can decrypt SSL sessions in certain cases.A remote user can with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can force a client to negotiate a downgrade to SSLv3 instead of a TLS v1.x protocol and then conduct a BEAST-style of attack to decrypt portions of the session.This protocol vulnerability is referred to as the POODLE ("Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption") vulnerability.This is a flaw in the protocol rather than in the SSL implementation.Cisco has assigned bug IDs CSCur33286 (for Cisco TelePresence Advanced Media Gateway 3610), CSCur33289 (for Cisco TelePresence IP Gateway Series), CSCur33294 (for Cisco TelePresence IP VCR Series), CSCur33282 (for Cisco TelePresence ISDN Gateway), CSCur33260 (for Cisco TelePresence MCU (8510, 8420, 4200, 4500 and 5300)), CSCur33267 (for Cisco TelePresence MSE 8050 Supervisor), CSCur33297 (for Cisco TelePresence Serial Gateway Series, CSCur33274 (for Cisco TelePresence Server 8710, 7010; for Cisco TelePresence Server on Multiparty Media 310, 324; and for Cisco TelePresence Server on Virtual Machine, CSCur23698 (for Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server), and CSCur33284 (for Cisco TelePresence MPS Series) to this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://www.openssl.org/~bodo/ssl-poodle.pdfBodo Moller, Thai Duong, and Krzysztof Kotowicz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3566.extra: A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can decrypt SSL sessions.

CVE-2014-3566.title: Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client SSL 3.0 Protocol Downgrade Flaw Lets Remote Users Decrypt SSL Traffic
CVE-2014-3566.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client. A remote user can decrypt SSL sessions in certain cases.A remote user can with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can force a client to negotiate a downgrade to SSLv3 instead of a TLS v1.x protocol and then conduct a BEAST-style of attack to decrypt portions of the session.This protocol vulnerability is referred to as the POODLE ("Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption") vulnerability.This is a flaw in the protocol rather than in the SSL implementation.The vendor has assigned bug IDs CSCur31571 (for Android), CSCur31566 (Apple iOS), and CSCur27617 (for Win/Mac/Linux) to this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://www.openssl.org/~bodo/ssl-poodle.pdfBodo Moller, Thai Duong, and Krzysztof Kotowicz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3566.extra: A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can decrypt SSL sessions.

CVE-2014-3566.title: OpenSSL SSL 3.0 Protocol Downgrade Flaw Lets Remote Users Decrypt SSL Traffic
CVE-2014-3566.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can decrypt SSL sessions in certain cases.A remote user can with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can force a client to negotiate a downgrade to SSLv3 instead of a TLS v1.x protocol and then conduct a BEAST-style of attack to decrypt portions of the session.This protocol vulnerability is referred to as the POODLE ("Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption") vulnerability.This is a flaw in the protocol rather than in the OpenSSL implementation.The original advisory is available at:https://www.openssl.org/~bodo/ssl-poodle.pdfBodo Moller, Thai Duong, and Krzysztof Kotowicz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3566.extra: A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can decrypt SSL sessions.

CVE-2014-3566.title: Cisco Prime Security Manager SSL 3.0 Protocol Downgrade Flaw Lets Remote Users Decrypt SSL Traffic
CVE-2014-3566.body: A vulnerability was reported in Cisco Prime Security Manager. A remote user can decrypt SSL sessions in certain cases.A remote user can with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can force a client to negotiate a downgrade to SSLv3 instead of a TLS v1.x protocol and then conduct a BEAST-style of attack to decrypt portions of the session.This protocol vulnerability is referred to as the POODLE ("Padding Oracle On Downgraded Legacy Encryption") vulnerability.This is a flaw in the protocol rather than in the SSL implementation.Cisco has assigned bug ID CSCur29172 to this vulnerability.The original advisory is available at:https://www.openssl.org/~bodo/ssl-poodle.pdfBodo Moller, Thai Duong, and Krzysztof Kotowicz reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3566.extra: A remote user with the ability to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack can decrypt SSL sessions.

CVE-2014-3567.title: OpenSSL SRTP and Session Ticket Memory Leaks Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3567.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted handshake message to trigger a memory leak in the DTLS SRTP extension parsing code and cause the target service to fail to free up to 64k of memory [CVE-2014-3513]. Server versions 1.0.1 are affected. Systems are affected even if not configured for SRTP. Systems compiled with OPENSSL_NO_SRTP defined are not affected.The vendor was notified on September 26, 2014.The LibreSSL project reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted session ticket to cause the target service to fail to free memory [CVE-2014-3567].The vendor was notified on October 8, 2014.
CVE-2014-3567.extra: A remote user can cause excessive memory consumption on the target system.

CVE-2014-3568.title: OpenSSL 'no-ssl3' Build Option Fails to Prevent SSL 3.0 Handshakes
CVE-2014-3568.body: A vulnerability was reported in OpenSSL. A remote user can bypass the intended build configuration and use SSL 3.0.The system does not properly enforce the 'no-ssl3' build option. A server built with this option may accept SSL 3.0 sessions. A client built with this option may generate SSL 3.0 sessions.The vendor was notified on October 14, 2014.Akamai Technologies reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3568.extra: A remote user can bypass the intended build configuration and use SSL 3.0.

CVE-2014-3570.title: HP Version Control Repository Manager Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-3570.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in HP Version Control Repository Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user [CVE-2015-5412].A remote user can gain unauthorized access, modify data, deny service, and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2015-5410].A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2015-5413].A remote user can send a specially crafted request to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2015-5411].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2015-5409].
CVE-2014-3570.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2014-3572.title: HP Version Control Repository Manager Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-3572.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in HP Version Control Repository Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.A remote user can create a specially crafted HTML page or URL that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user [CVE-2015-5412].A remote user can gain unauthorized access, modify data, deny service, and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2015-5410].A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2015-5413].A remote user can send a specially crafted request to view potentially sensitive information on the target system [CVE-2015-5411].A remote user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2015-5409].
CVE-2014-3572.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target system acting as the target authenticated user.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2014-3573.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager XXE Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Obtain Files on the Target System
CVE-2014-3573.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager. A remote authenticated user can obtain files on the target system.A remote authenticated user can supply specially crafted XML External Entity (XXE) data to the ovirt-engine to trigger a flaw in the processing of XML/RSDL documents and read files on the target system with the privileges of the target ovirt-engine JBoss server.Arun Babu Neelicattu of Red Hat Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3573.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain files on the target system.

CVE-2014-3575.title: Apache OpenOffice OLE Object Preview Flaw May Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3575.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache OpenOffice. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will exploit a flaw in the generation of OLE object previews to include arbitrary file data. The file data may be exposed if the file is subsequently saved and distributed.Open-Xchange reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3575.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive file information.

CVE-2014-3576.title: Oracle Fusion Middleware Bugs Let Remote Users Access and Modify Data and Remote and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3576.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Oracle Fusion Middleware. A remote user can access and modify data on the target system. A remote or local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Enterprise Data Quality Installation component to partially access data, partially modify data, and partially deny service [CVE-2014-3576].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle JDeveloper ADF Faces component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4909].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Sites Security component to partially access and partially modify data [CVE-2010-1622].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Access Manager SSO Engine component to partially access data [CVE-2015-4912].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Identity Manager OIM Legacy UI component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4832].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Content Content Server component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4867, CVE-2015-4880].A remote user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle WebCenter Sites Security component to partially modify data [CVE-2015-4799].A remote authenticated user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle JDeveloper ADF Faces component to partially access data [CVE-2015-4838].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Outside In Technology Outside In Filters component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4877, CVE-2015-4878].A local user can exploit a flaw in the Oracle Outside In Technology Outside In PDF Export SDK component to cause partial denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-4809, CVE-2015-4811].The following researchers reported these and other Oracle product vulnerabilities:Aaron Portnoy of Exodus Intelligence; Adam Gowdiak of Security Explorations; Adam Willard of Foreground Security; Advanced Threat Research Team, Intel Security; Aleksandr Dubinsky of SyncWords; Alexey Tyurin of ERPScan; Andrea Palazzo of Truel IT; Behzad Najjarpour Jabbari of Secunia Research; Borked of the Google Security Team; Brooks Li of Trend Micro; Cihan Oncu of Biznet Bilisim A.S.; Colm O hEigeartaigh; Dan Peled; David Byrne of Trustwave SpiderLabs; David Litchfield of Google; Egor Karbutov of ERPScan; Erlend Oftedal; FortiGuard Labs of Fortinet, Inc.; Francis Provencher from COSIG; Francois Goichon of Context Information Security; G. Geshev from MWR Labs; Gregory Golds; Guido Vranken; Ivan Chalykin of ERPScan; Jacob Smith; Jakub Palaczynski from ING Services Polska; Jeff Kayser of Jibe Consulting; Kana Toko; Khai Tran of Netspi; Leopold von Niebelschuetz-Godlewski of Trustwave; Marcin Gebarowski; Nikita Kelesis of ERPScan; Osanda Malith Jayathissa; Oscar Andersson; Red Hat Product Security; Sergey Gorbaty of Salesforce.com; Travis Emmert of Salesforce.com; and Ugur Cihan Koc of Avea Iletisim Hizmetleri A.S.
CVE-2014-3576.extra: A remote user can obtain data on the target system.A remote user can modify data on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-3581.title: Apache mod_cache Null Pointer Dereference Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3581.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache mod_cache. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted Content-Type header value to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target service to crash.
CVE-2014-3581.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-3586.title: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform '.jboss-cli-history' Weak File Permissions Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3586.body: A vulnerability was reported in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A local user can access potentially sensitive information on the target system.The default command line interface configuration creates weak permissions for the '.jboss-cli-history' file. A local user can access the file to obtain potentially sensitive information.
CVE-2014-3586.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3635.title: D-BUS Buffer Overflow and Multiple Processing Flaws Let Local Users Obtain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2014-3635.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in D-BUS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems where the 'max_message_unix_fds' limit is set to an odd number, a local user can supply a specially crafted file descriptor to trigger a heap overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-3635]. 32-bit systems are not affected.A local user can cause the target dbus-daemon to reach the RLIMIT_NOFILE limit, preventing new clients from connecting or send an excessive number of file descriptors to cause the target recipient to be disconnected [CVE-2014-3636].A local user can create D-Bus connections that persist after the process that created them has terminated [CVE-2014-3637].A local user can open the maximum number of parallel connections and sending the maximum number of method calls per connection to cause the target dbus-daemon to become slow [CVE-2014-3638].A local user can make multiple connection attempts that do not complete the authentication handshake to cause other connection attempts to fail [CVE-2014-3639].Alban Crequy and Simon McVittie at Collabora Ltd. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3635.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause connections to fail or be dropped and cause processing to be slow.

CVE-2014-3636.title: D-BUS Buffer Overflow and Multiple Processing Flaws Let Local Users Obtain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2014-3636.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in D-BUS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems where the 'max_message_unix_fds' limit is set to an odd number, a local user can supply a specially crafted file descriptor to trigger a heap overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-3635]. 32-bit systems are not affected.A local user can cause the target dbus-daemon to reach the RLIMIT_NOFILE limit, preventing new clients from connecting or send an excessive number of file descriptors to cause the target recipient to be disconnected [CVE-2014-3636].A local user can create D-Bus connections that persist after the process that created them has terminated [CVE-2014-3637].A local user can open the maximum number of parallel connections and sending the maximum number of method calls per connection to cause the target dbus-daemon to become slow [CVE-2014-3638].A local user can make multiple connection attempts that do not complete the authentication handshake to cause other connection attempts to fail [CVE-2014-3639].Alban Crequy and Simon McVittie at Collabora Ltd. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3636.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause connections to fail or be dropped and cause processing to be slow.

CVE-2014-3638.title: D-BUS Buffer Overflow and Multiple Processing Flaws Let Local Users Obtain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2014-3638.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in D-BUS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems where the 'max_message_unix_fds' limit is set to an odd number, a local user can supply a specially crafted file descriptor to trigger a heap overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-3635]. 32-bit systems are not affected.A local user can cause the target dbus-daemon to reach the RLIMIT_NOFILE limit, preventing new clients from connecting or send an excessive number of file descriptors to cause the target recipient to be disconnected [CVE-2014-3636].A local user can create D-Bus connections that persist after the process that created them has terminated [CVE-2014-3637].A local user can open the maximum number of parallel connections and sending the maximum number of method calls per connection to cause the target dbus-daemon to become slow [CVE-2014-3638].A local user can make multiple connection attempts that do not complete the authentication handshake to cause other connection attempts to fail [CVE-2014-3639].Alban Crequy and Simon McVittie at Collabora Ltd. reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3638.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause connections to fail or be dropped and cause processing to be slow.

CVE-2014-3639.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in D-BUS. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems where the 'max_message_unix_fds' limit is set to an odd number, a local user can supply a specially crafted file descriptor to trigger a heap overflow to execute arbitrary code on the target system with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-3635]. 32-bit systems are not affected.A local user can cause the target dbus-daemon to reach the RLIMIT_NOFILE limit, preventing new clients from connecting or send an excessive number of file descriptors to cause the target recipient to be disconnected [CVE-2014-3636].A local user can create D-Bus connections that persist after the process that created them has terminated [CVE-2014-3637].A local user can open the maximum number of parallel connections and sending the maximum number of method calls per connection to cause the target dbus-daemon to become slow [CVE-2014-3638].A local user can make multiple connection attempts that do not complete the authentication handshake to cause other connection attempts to fail [CVE-2014-3639].Alban Crequy and Simon McVittie at Collabora Ltd. reported these vulnerabilities.
