CVE-2014-3710.title: FreeBSD file(1) and libmagic(3) File Processing Flaws Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3710.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.A local user can trigger several flaws in the ELF parser to cause the libmagic(3) library (used by the file(1) utility) to consume excessive resources or crash.Thomas Jarosch of Intra2net AG reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3710.extra: A local user can cause the target system to consume excessive resources or crash.

CVE-2014-3711.title: FreeBSD namei Kernel Facility Memory Leak Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3711.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD namei. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a memory leak in the namei kernel facility. The leak occurs when a sandboxed process looks up a non-existent path name with namei.Mateusz Guzik reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3711.extra: A remote user can consume excessive memory resources on the target system.

CVE-2014-3714.title: Xen ARM Guest Loading Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3714.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.When loading a 32-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3714].When validating a 32-bit guest kernel for an appended device tree blob, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3715].When evaluating a device tree blob header, a local user can trigger an alignment flaw [CVE-2014-3716].When loading a 64-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a load address buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3717].These vulnerabilities can be exploited to obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space or cause the toolstack process to crash.Thomas Leonard reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3714.extra: A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can cause the toolstack process to crash.A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space.

CVE-2014-3715.title: Xen ARM Guest Loading Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3715.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.When loading a 32-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3714].When validating a 32-bit guest kernel for an appended device tree blob, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3715].When evaluating a device tree blob header, a local user can trigger an alignment flaw [CVE-2014-3716].When loading a 64-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a load address buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3717].These vulnerabilities can be exploited to obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space or cause the toolstack process to crash.Thomas Leonard reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3715.extra: A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can cause the toolstack process to crash.A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space.

CVE-2014-3716.title: Xen ARM Guest Loading Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3716.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.When loading a 32-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3714].When validating a 32-bit guest kernel for an appended device tree blob, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3715].When evaluating a device tree blob header, a local user can trigger an alignment flaw [CVE-2014-3716].When loading a 64-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a load address buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3717].These vulnerabilities can be exploited to obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space or cause the toolstack process to crash.Thomas Leonard reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3716.extra: A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can cause the toolstack process to crash.A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space.

CVE-2014-3717.title: Xen ARM Guest Loading Bugs Let Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3717.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Xen. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.When loading a 32-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3714].When validating a 32-bit guest kernel for an appended device tree blob, a local user can trigger a buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3715].When evaluating a device tree blob header, a local user can trigger an alignment flaw [CVE-2014-3716].When loading a 64-bit ARM guest kernel, a local user can trigger a load address buffer overflow [CVE-2014-3717].These vulnerabilities can be exploited to obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space or cause the toolstack process to crash.Thomas Leonard reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-3717.extra: A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can cause the toolstack process to crash.A local user with privileges to load a guest kernel can obtain potentially sensitive information from the toolstack address space.

CVE-2014-3780.title: Citrix VDI-in-a-Box Unspecified Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass Authentication
CVE-2014-3780.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix VDI-in-a-Box. A remote user can bypass authentication.A remote user can bypass authentication to gain access to VDI instances.
CVE-2014-3780.extra: A remote user can bypass authentication.

CVE-2014-3790.title: VMware vCenter Server Appliance RVC Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3790.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware vCenter Server Appliance. A remote authenticated user can execute commands on the target system with elevated privileges.A remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to escape a chroot jail via the Ruby vSphere Console (RVC) and execute commands with root privileges.The vendor was notified on November 7, 2013.The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-14-159/Shanon Olsson (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3790.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute commands on the target system with elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-3796.title: VMware vCloud Networking and Security (vCNS) Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Obtain Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-3796.body: A vulnerability was reported in VMware vCloud Networking and Security (vCNS). A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can obtain unspecified "critical" information.VMware NSX 6.0.x is also affected.
CVE-2014-3796.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-3798.title: Citrix XenServer Tools Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3798.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix XenServer. A remote user on the local network can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the local network can send specially crafted Ethernet frames to a target guest system with XenServer tools installed to cause the target guest system to crash.Windows-based guest virtual machines are affected.
CVE-2014-3798.extra: A remote user on the local network can cause the target guest system to crash.

CVE-2014-3815.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series SIP ALG flowd Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3815.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems with SIP ALG enabled, a remote user can send a specially crafted SIP packet to cause the target flowd process to crash.SRX Series devices are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 964817 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3815.extra: A remote user can cause the flowd process to crash.

CVE-2014-3816.title: Juniper Junos Unspecified Command Line Interface Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Root Privileges
CVE-2014-3816.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.A local user on the command line interface can invoke certain combinations of commands to gain root privileges on the target system.The vendor has assigned PRs 969408, 969365, 966808, 965762, 965758, 964860, 962834, 961449, 961397, and 928128 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3816.extra: A local user can obtain root privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-3817.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series NAT flowd Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3817.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.On systems with NAT protocol translation from IPv4 to IPv6 enabled, a remote user can send a specially crafted packet to cause the target flowd process to crash.SRX Series devices are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 954437 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3817.extra: A remote user can cause the flowd process to crash.

CVE-2014-3818.title: Juniper Junos BGP UPDATE Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3818.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted BGP UPDATE to trigger a memory corruption error and cause the target routing protocol daemon (rpd) to crash and restart.A specially crafted set of transitive attributes can trigger the flaw.Only routers supporting 4-byte AS numbers are affected if the BGP peer does not support 4-byte AS numbers.The vendor has assigned PR 953037 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3818.extra: A remote user can cause the target rpd to crash and restart.

CVE-2014-3819.title: Juniper Junos PIM Routing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3819.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted PIM packet to cause the target RPD routing process to crash.Systems with PIM enabled and Auto-RP configured are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 947395 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3819.extra: A remote user can cause the RPD routing process to crash.

CVE-2014-3820.title: Juniper Junos Pulse Secure Access Service (SSL VPN) Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3820.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos Pulse Secure Access Service (SSL VPN). A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The Junos Pulse SSL VPN/UAC web server does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target authenticated administrative user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Junos Pulse interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.UAC versions 41, 4.4, and 5.0 are also affected.
CVE-2014-3820.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Junos Pulse web interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3821.title: Juniper Junos SRX Input Validation Flaw in Web Authentication Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3821.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos SRX Series. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The web authentication (webauth) interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the webauth interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.SRX Series devices are affected.Pass-Through authentication is not affected.The vendor has assigned PR 907664 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3821.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the webauth interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3822.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series IPv6/IPv4 Translation flowd Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3822.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted packet to cause the target flowd process to crash when the packet is translated from IPv6 to IPv4.SRX Series devices are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 747680 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3822.extra: A remote user can cause the flowd process to crash.

CVE-2014-3825.title: Juniper Junos SRX Series flowd Bug Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3825.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted packet to cause the target flowd service to crash.SRX Series devices with an Application Layer Gateway (ALG) enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 986369 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3825.extra: A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-3859.title: ISC BIND EDNS Option Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3859.body: A vulnerability was reported in ISC BIND. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted query to trigger a flaw in EDNS option processing and cause the target service to crash.Both authoritative and recursive servers are affected.The vulnerability resides in libdns. As a result, applications that use the library may be affected.
CVE-2014-3859.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-3873.title: FreeBSD Kernel ktrace Bug Lets Local Users Obtain Portions of System Memory
CVE-2014-3873.body: A vulnerability was reported in the FreeBSD Kernel. A local user can obtain portions of system memory.A local user with privileges to invoke the ktrace utility can trigger a flaw to read the contents of kernel memory.Jilles Tjoelker reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3873.extra: A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory on the target system.

CVE-2014-3878.title: IMail Server Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3878.body: A vulnerability was reported in IMail Server. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IMail Server software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The new contacts, adding group, calendar, and task sections are affected.Peru (GoSecure!) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3878.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IMail Server software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3879.title: FreeBSD PAM Policy Parser Remote Authentication Bypass
CVE-2014-3879.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD. A remote user can bypass PAM authentication in certain cases.In certain cases where a module is removed or where the name of a module is misspelled in the policy file, the Pluggable Authentication Modules (PAM) library may process a partially loaded configuration and allow a remote user to login without a password or with an incorrect password.Peter Wemm and Dag-Erling Smorgrav reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3879.extra: A remote user can bypass PAM authentication in certain cases.

CVE-2014-3922.title: Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security Virtual Appliance Input Validation Hole Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3922.body: A vulnerability was reported in Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The '/addWhiteListDomain.imss' page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'addWhiteListDomainStr' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.William Costa reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3922.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Trend Micro InterScan Messaging Security interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3924.title: Webmin Input Validation Flaws in Popup Windows Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3924.body: A vulnerability was reported in Webmin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Popup windows do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Webmin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-3924.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Webmin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3924.title: Usermin Input Validation Flaws in Popup Windows Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3924.body: A vulnerability was reported in Usermin. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Popup windows do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Usermin software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-3924.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Usermin software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3952.title: FreeBSD Kernel Memory Initialization Flaws Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3952.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.Control message buffers are not properly initialized [CVE-2014-3952].Several SCTP messages (i.e., SCTP_SNDRCV, SCTP_EXTRCV, and SCTP_RCVINFO) are not properly initialized [CVE-2014-3953].A local user can exploit these flaws to obtain portions of kernel memory.Michael Tuexen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3952.extra: A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.

CVE-2014-3953.title: FreeBSD Kernel Memory Initialization Flaws Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3953.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in FreeBSD. A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.A local user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with elevated privileges.Control message buffers are not properly initialized [CVE-2014-3952].Several SCTP messages (i.e., SCTP_SNDRCV, SCTP_EXTRCV, and SCTP_RCVINFO) are not properly initialized [CVE-2014-3953].A local user can exploit these flaws to obtain portions of kernel memory.Michael Tuexen reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3953.extra: A local user can obtain portions of kernel memory.

CVE-2014-3954.title: FreeBSD Buffer Overflow in rtsold(8) IPv6 Router Solicitation Daemon May Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-3954.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD rtsold(8). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted router advertisement data to trigger a buffer overflow in rtsold(8) and cause the daemon to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target service.Florian Obser and Hiroki Sato reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3954.extra: A remote user can cause the target daemon to crash.A remote user may be able to execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-3955.title: FreeBSD routed(8) Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-3955.body: A vulnerability was reported in FreeBSD routed. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted routing information protocol (RIP) request to cause the target routed(8) service to crash.Hiroki Sato reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3955.extra: A remote user can cause the target routed daemon to crash.

CVE-2014-3956.title: Sendmail 'close-on-exec' File Descriptor Error Lets Local Users Interfere With SMTP Connections in Certain Cases
CVE-2014-3956.body: A vulnerability was reported in Sendmail. A local user can cause denial of service conditions.The application does not properly set the close-on-exec flag for file descriptors. As a result, a local user that can execute an arbitrary mail delivery agent can access open file descriptors for the parent sendmail process. This can be exploited to interfere with open SMTP connections.
CVE-2014-3956.extra: A local user can interfere with open SMTP connections in certain cases.

CVE-2014-3959.title: F5 Enterprise Manager Input Validation Flaw in Configuration Utility 'list.jsp' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3959.body: A vulnerability was reported in F5 Enterprise Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The configuration utility 'list.jsp' page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in some parameters before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the F5 Enterprise Manager interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned ID 447483 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3959.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the F5 Enterprise Manager interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3959.title: F5 BIG-IP Input Validation Flaw in Configuration Utility 'list.jsp' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3959.body: A vulnerability was reported in F5 BIG-IP. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The configuration utility 'list.jsp' page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in some parameters before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the F5 BIG-IP interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vendor has assigned ID 462582 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3959.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the F5 BIG-IP interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3966.title: MediaWiki Input Validation Flaw in 'Special:PasswordReset' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-3966.body: A vulnerability was reported in MediaWiki. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'Special:PasswordReset' page does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input in the 'username' parameter before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the MediaWiki software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Systems with wgRawHtml enabled are affected.Omer Iqbal reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3966.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the MediaWiki software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-3969.title: Xen ARM Guest Memory Permission Check Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-3969.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system does not properly check permissions when accessing guest memory. A local administrative user on a guest operating system can exploit this flaw to obtain privileges on another domain, including the host system.Both 32- and 64-bit ARM systems are affected.Julien Grall reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-3969.extra: A local administrative user on the guest operating system can obtain privileges on the target host system.

CVE-2014-4014.title: Linux Kernel inode_capable() Incorrect Capability Check Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-4014.body: A vulnerability was reported in the Linux Kernel. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The system does not properly use the inode_capable() in determining capabilities of the user or group. A local user may be able to exploit this to gain elevated privileges on the target system.Andy Lutomirski reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4014.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-4021.title: Xen Lets Local Guests Obtain Hypervisor Heap Memory Contents
CVE-2014-4021.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information from other domains.The system does not properly control access to memory pages during memory cleanup for dying guest systems. A local user on a guest system can access information from guest or hypervisor memory, potentially including guest CPU register state and hypercall arguments.Versions 3.1.x and prior have not been evaluated to determine if they are affected.Jan Beulich reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4021.extra: A local user on a guest system can access information from guest or hypervisor memory in certain cases.

CVE-2014-4022.title: Xen ARM GNTTABOP_setup_table() Discloses Potentially Sensitive Information to Local Users
CVE-2014-4022.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on a guest domain can obtain potentially sensitive information from other domains.On ARM-based systems, the system does not properly initialize memory that contains the list of the domain's grant table pages. A local administrator on a guest operating system can invoke the GNTTABOP_setup_table() call to obtain potentially sensitive information from another domain.Julien Grall reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4022.extra: A local administrative user on a guest domain can obtain potentially sensitive information from other domains.

CVE-2014-4023.title: F5 BIG-IP Input Validation Flaw in 'tmui/dashboard/echo.jsp' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-4023.body: A vulnerability was reported in F5 BIG-IP. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'tmui/dashboard/echo.jsp' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted request that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the BIG-IP interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The BIG-IP Configuration utility and the Enterprise Manager Configuration utility are affected.The vendor has assigned ID 470796 (for BIG-IP) and ID 476101 (for Enterprise Manager) to this vulnerability.The vendor was notified on July 8, 2014.The original advisory is available at:https://www.sec-consult.com/en/Vulnerability-Lab/Advisories.htmStefan Viehbock of SEC Consult Vulnerability Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4023.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the BIG-IP interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4037.title: FCKeditor Input Validation Flaw in Spellchecker Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-4037.body: A vulnerability was reported in FCKeditor. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the FCKeditor software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The 'editor/dialog/fck_spellerpages/spellerpages/server-scripts/spellchecker.php' script is affected.Robin Bailey of Dionach reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4037.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the FCKeditor software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4049.title: PHP Buffer Overflow in dns_get_record() Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4049.body: A vulnerability was reported in PHP. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote server can return specially crafted DNS TXT record data to trigger a buffer overflow in dns_get_record() and execute arbitrary code on the target system.PHP applications that use the dns_get_record() function to perform DNS queries are affected.Stefan Esser reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4049.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-4050.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Mulitple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4050.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2774, CVE-2014-2784, CVE-2014-2796, CVE-2014-2808, CVE-2014-2810, CVE-2014-2811, CVE-2014-2818, CVE-2014-2820, CVE-2014-2821, CVE-2014-2822, CVE-2014-2823, CVE-2014-2824, CVE-2014-2825, CVE-2014-2826, CVE-2014-2827, CVE-2014-4050, CVE-2014-4051, CVE-2014-4052, CVE-2014-4055, CVE-2014-4056, CVE-2014-4057, CVE-2014-4058, CVE-2014-4063, CVE-2014-4067, CVE-2014-6354]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user that can exploit another vulnerability can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2014-2817, CVE-2014-2819].One of these privilege escalation vulnerabilities is being actively exploited.AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yujie Wen of Qihoo 360, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of NSFOCUS Security Team, IronRock (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Zeguang Zhao of Team509 and Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Arthur Gerkis (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Zuckerbraun of HP's Zero Day Initiative, Omair (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Wei Wang of VulnHunt reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4050.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

This can be exploited to detect and avoid anti-malware applications.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2799, CVE-2014-4059, CVE-2014-4065, CVE-2014-4079, CVE-2014-4080, CVE-2014-4081, CVE-2014-4082, CVE-2014-4083, CVE-2014-4084, CVE-2014-4085, CVE-2014-4086, CVE-2014-4087, CVE-2014-4088, CVE-2014-4089, CVE-2014-4090, CVE-2014-4091, CVE-2014-4092, CVE-2014-4093, CVE-2014-4094, CVE-2014-4095, CVE-2014-4096, CVE-2014-4097, CVE-2014-4098, CVE-2014-4099, CVE-2014-4100, CVE-2014-4101, CVE-2014-4102, CVE-2014-4103, CVE-2014-4104, CVE-2014-4105, CVE-2014-4106, CVE-2014-4107, CVE-2014-4108, CVE-2014-4109, CVE-2014-4110, CVE-2014-4111]. CVE-2014-4061.title: Microsoft SQL Server Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting Attacks and Local Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-4061.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SQL Server. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A local user can supply a specially crafted Transact-SQL (T-SQL) query to trigger a stack overrun and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2014-4061]. A manual reboot is required to return the system to normal operation.The SQL Master Data Services (MDS) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-1820]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL or web content that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the Microsoft SQL Server inteface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-4061.extra: A local user can cause the the target system to stop responding.A remote user can take actions on the database acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4062.title: Microsoft .NET Flaw Lets Remote Users Bypass ASLR Security Protections
CVE-2014-4062.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can bypass security protection features.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) protection features on the target user's system.
CVE-2014-4062.extra: A remote user can bypass security protection features.

CVE-2014-4067.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Mulitple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4067.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2774, CVE-2014-2784, CVE-2014-2796, CVE-2014-2808, CVE-2014-2810, CVE-2014-2811, CVE-2014-2818, CVE-2014-2820, CVE-2014-2821, CVE-2014-2822, CVE-2014-2823, CVE-2014-2824, CVE-2014-2825, CVE-2014-2826, CVE-2014-2827, CVE-2014-4050, CVE-2014-4051, CVE-2014-4052, CVE-2014-4055, CVE-2014-4056, CVE-2014-4057, CVE-2014-4058, CVE-2014-4063, CVE-2014-4067, CVE-2014-6354]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user that can exploit another vulnerability can gain elevated privileges [CVE-2014-2817, CVE-2014-2819].One of these privilege escalation vulnerabilities is being actively exploited.AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yujie Wen of Qihoo 360, Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of NSFOCUS Security Team, IronRock (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Zeguang Zhao of Team509 and Liang Chen of KeenTeam (@K33nTeam) (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Arthur Gerkis (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Simon Zuckerbraun of HP's Zero Day Initiative, Omair (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Wei Wang of VulnHunt reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4067.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-4068.title: Microsoft Lync Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2014-4068.body: Three vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Lync. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can send a specially crafted call to trigger an exception handling error on the server and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2014-4068].Peter Schraffl of Telecommunication Software GmbH reported this vulnerability.The server does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-4070]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft Lync software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Noam Rathaus (via Beyond Security's SecuriTeam Secure Disclosure team) reported this vulnerability.A remote user can send a specially crafted request to trigger a null dereference and cause the target system to stop responding [CVE-2014-4071].
CVE-2014-4068.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to stop responding.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft Lync software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4072.title: Microsoft .NET Hash Collision Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-4072.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted data to trigger a hash collision and cause performance degradation on the target .NET-enabled website.Microsoft .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 is not affected.Alexander Klink of Cynops GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4072.extra: A remote user can cause performance degradation on the target system.

CVE-2014-4073.title: Microsoft .NET Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass ASLR Security Protections and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4073.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A remote user can create a specially crafted internationalized resource identifier to a .NET application to trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4121].A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature [CVE-2014-4122].The ClickOnce feature processes data prior to verification. A remote user that can exploit an independent flaw in Internet Explorer may be able to allow the ClickOnce installer process to run outside of Protected Mode with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-4073].James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported the ClickOnce vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4073.extra: A remote user can create a URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A user can run code with elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-4074.title: Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler Integrity Check Error Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-4074.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.The Windows Task Scheduler does not properly check the integrity of tasks. A local user can run a specially crafted application to execute arbitrary code on the target system with Local System privileges.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4074.extra: A local user can obtain Local System privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-4075.title: ASP.NET MVC Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-4075.body: A vulnerability was reported in ASP.NET. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The ASP.NET Model View Controller (MVC) does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the ASP.NET software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The vulnerability resides in 'System.Web.Mvc.dll'.
CVE-2014-4075.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the ASP.NET software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4077.title: Microsoft Office IME Sandbox Bypass Flaw Lets Remote Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-4077.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Office IME (Japanese). A remote user can bypass sandbox restrictions to gain elevated privileges.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass the application sandbox and gain elevated privileges.Vitaly Kamluk and Costin Raiu of Kaspersky Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4077.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass sandbox restrictions to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-4077.title: Microsoft Input Method Editor (Japanese) Sandbox Bypass Flaw Lets Remote Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-4077.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Input Method Editor (IME) (Japanese). A remote user can bypass sandbox restrictions to gain elevated privileges.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass the application sandbox and gain elevated privileges.Vitaly Kamluk and Costin Raiu of Kaspersky Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4077.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will bypass sandbox restrictions to gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-4078.title: Microsoft Internet Information Server Lets Remote Users Bypass Security Features
CVE-2014-4078.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Internet Information Server (IIS). A remote user can bypass address-based access control security feature.A remote user can bypass the "IP and domain restriction" filtering list to access the web service.
CVE-2014-4078.extra: A remote user can bypass the address-based access control security feature.

CVE-2014-4079.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Mulitple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-4079.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will invoke the XMLDOM ActiveX control and determine valid resources on the target system [CVE-2013-7331]. This can be exploited to detect and avoid anti-malware applications.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-2799, CVE-2014-4059, CVE-2014-4065, CVE-2014-4079, CVE-2014-4080, CVE-2014-4081, CVE-2014-4082, CVE-2014-4083, CVE-2014-4084, CVE-2014-4085, CVE-2014-4086, CVE-2014-4087, CVE-2014-4088, CVE-2014-4089, CVE-2014-4090, CVE-2014-4091, CVE-2014-4092, CVE-2014-4093, CVE-2014-4094, CVE-2014-4095, CVE-2014-4096, CVE-2014-4097, CVE-2014-4098, CVE-2014-4099, CVE-2014-4100, CVE-2014-4101, CVE-2014-4102, CVE-2014-4103, CVE-2014-4104, CVE-2014-4105, CVE-2014-4106, CVE-2014-4107, CVE-2014-4108, CVE-2014-4109, CVE-2014-4110, CVE-2014-4111]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Adlab of Venustech, AbdulAziz Hariri (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 56e7aec02099b976120abfda31254b05 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Qihoo 360, Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Zhibin Hu of Qihoo 360, Garage4Hackers (via HP's Zero Day Initiative, A3F2160DCA1BDE70DA1D99ED267D5DC1EC336192 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jason Kratzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Yuki Chen of Trend Micro (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), cloudfuzzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), AbdulAziz Hariri of HP's Zero Day Initiative, an anonymous researcher (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jose A. Vazquez of Yenteasy (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Liu Long of Qihoo 360, John Villamil (@day6reak), Heige, and Yujie Wen of Qihoo 360 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4079.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-4116.title: Microsoft SharePoint Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-4116.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft SharePoint. A remote authenticated user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The system does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input on SharePoint lists before displaying the input. A remote authenticated user can create a specially crafted list entry that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Drew Calcott of EY reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4116.extra: A remote authenticated user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Microsoft SharePoint software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4118.title: Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML) XML Parsing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4118.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft XML Core Services (MSXML). A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user via Microsoft Internet Explorer, will trigger an XML parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system.Alisa Esage Shevchenko of Esage Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4118.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-4121.title: Microsoft .NET Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass ASLR Security Protections and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4121.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A remote user can create a specially crafted internationalized resource identifier to a .NET application to trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4121].A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature [CVE-2014-4122].The ClickOnce feature processes data prior to verification. A remote user that can exploit an independent flaw in Internet Explorer may be able to allow the ClickOnce installer process to run outside of Protected Mode with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-4073].James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported the ClickOnce vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4121.extra: A remote user can create a URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A user can run code with elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-4122.title: Microsoft .NET Bugs Let Remote Users Bypass ASLR Security Protections and Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4122.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A remote user can create a specially crafted internationalized resource identifier to a .NET application to trigger a parsing error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4121].A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature [CVE-2014-4122].The ClickOnce feature processes data prior to verification. A remote user that can exploit an independent flaw in Internet Explorer may be able to allow the ClickOnce installer process to run outside of Protected Mode with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-4073].James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported the ClickOnce vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4122.extra: A remote user can create a URI that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A user can run code with elevated privileges.

A remote user can bypass security features.A user can cause scripting code to be run with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-4123, CVE-2014-4124].A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature [CVE-2014-4140].A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4126, CVE-2014-4127, CVE-2014-4128, CVE-2014-4129, CVE-2014-4130, CVE-2014-4132, CVE-2014-4133, CVE-2014-4134, CVE-2014-4137, CVE-2014-4138, CVE-2014-4141].James Forshaw of Context Information Security, Rohit Mothe (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, Omair (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), Jason Kratzer, Adlab of Venustech, Sky (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Zhibin Hu of Qihoo 360, Jose A. Vazquez of Yenteasy - Security Research (via VeriSign iDefense Labs), Liu Long of Qihoo 360, SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), John Villamil (@day6reak), and Peter 'corelanc0d3r' Van Eeckhoutte of Corelan (via HP's Zero Day Initiative) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4129.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A user can bypass the Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security feature.A user can gain elevated privileges.

CVE-2014-4143.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass ASLR Security Protection
CVE-2014-4143.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4143, CVE-2014-6337, CVE-2014-6341, CVE-2014-6342, CVE-2014-6343, CVE-2014-6344, CVE-2014-6347, CVE-2014-6348, CVE-2014-6351, CVE-2014-6353]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can cause scripts to be executed with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-6349, CVE-2014-6350].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from another domain [CVE-2014-6340, CVE-2014-6345, CVE-2014-6346].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's clipboard [CVE-2014-6323].A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features [CVE-2014-6339].s3tm3m (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Daniel Trebbien, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 0016EECD9D7159A949DAD3BC17E0A939 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jason Kratzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Takeshi Terada, Cloudfuzzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), A3F2160DCA1BDE70DA1D99ED267D5DC1EC336192 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), James Forshaw (via Google Project Zero), and Pengfei Guo of Qihoo 360 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4143.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features.

CVE-2014-4149.title: Microsoft .NET Remoting Object Handling Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4149.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft .NET. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user can send specially crafted data to a target system running .NET Remoting to trigger an error in TypeFilterLevel checking on malformed objects and execute arbitrary code on the target system.James Forshaw of Context Information Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4149.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-4165.title: Ntop Input Validation Flaw in 'rrdPlugin' Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-4165.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ntop. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The 'rrdPlugin' script does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Ntop software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The original advisory is available at:http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/127043/ntop-xss.txtManish Kishan Tanwar from INDISHELL Lab reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4165.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Ntop software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4200.title: VMware Tools Temporary File Permission Flaws Lets Local Users Deny Service and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-4200.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in VMware Tools. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A local user can exploit a flaw in the creation of temporary files in '/tmp' to cause system files on the target system to be overwritten by the target user running vm-support [CVE-2014-4199].The vm-support archive in the '/tmp' has world-readable permissions [CVE-2014-4200]. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.Dolev Farhi reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4200.extra: A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-4341.title: MIT Kerberos Multiple Memory Errors Let Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-4341.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in MIT Kerberos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user with the ability to inject packets into a valid GSSAPI application session can trigger a buffer overread and cause the application to crash [CVE-2014-4341].A remote user with the ability to inject packets into a valid GSSAPI application session can trigger a buffer overread or null pointer dereference and cause the application to crash [CVE-2014-4342].A remote user with the ability to spoof packets from a GSSAPI application acceptor to trigger a double-free memory error and cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-4343].A remote authenticated or partially authenticated user can send specially crafted data during a SPNEGO negotiation to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target application to crash [CVE-2014-4344].
CVE-2014-4341.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.

A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user with the ability to inject packets into a valid GSSAPI application session can trigger a buffer overread and cause the application to crash [CVE-2014-4341].A remote user with the ability to inject packets into a valid GSSAPI application session can trigger a buffer overread or null pointer dereference and cause the application to crash [CVE-2014-4342].A remote user with the ability to spoof packets from a GSSAPI application acceptor to trigger a double-free memory error and cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-4343].A remote authenticated or partially authenticated user can send specially crafted data during a SPNEGO negotiation to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the target application to crash [CVE-2014-4344].
CVE-2014-4342.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash or potentially execute arbitrary code.

CVE-2014-4345.title: MIT Kerberos Buffer Overflow in kadmind with LDAP Backend Lets Remote Authenticated Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4345.body: A vulnerability was reported in MIT Kerberos. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.On systems where kadmind uses LDAP for the KDC database, a remote authenticated user can send specially crafted data to trigger an off-by-one buffer overflow in kadmind and potentially execute arbitrary code on the target system.The krb5_encode_krbsecretkey() function is affected.Tomas Kuthan and Greg Hudson reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4345.extra: A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-4346.title: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-4346.body: A vulnerability was reported in Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-4346, CVE-2014-4347]. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller (ADC) software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Stefan Viehbock of SEC Consult reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4346.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Citrix NetScaler ADC software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-4350.title: Apple OS X Multiple Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-4350.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple OS X. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create a specially crafted RLE encoded movie file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-1391]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can create a specially crafted MIDI file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4350].A local application can trigger a null pointer dereference in the handling of IOKit API arguments to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4376].A local application can trigger a validation flaw in the handling of a Bluetooth API call to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4390].A local user can compile untrusted GLSL shaders to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-4393].A local application can trigger a validation flaw in some integrated graphics driver routines to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4394, CVE-2014-4395, CVE-2014-4396, CVE-2014-4397, CVE-2014-4398, CVE-2014-4399, CVE-2014-4400, CVE-2014-4401, CVE-2014-4416].A local application can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read in the handling of an IOAcceleratorFamily function to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4402].The CPU Global Descriptor Table is allocated at a predictable address [CVE-2014-4403]. A local user can exploit this to infer kernel addresses and bypass kernel address space layout randomization.Fernando Munoz (via iDefense VCP), Tom Gallagher and Paul Bates (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), s3tm3m (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), and Ian Beer of Google Project Zero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4350.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information to bypass kernel address space layout randomization.

CVE-2014-4351.title: Apple QuickTime Buffer Overflow in Processing Audio Samples Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-4351.body: A vulnerability was reported in QuickTime. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create an 'm4a' file containing specially crafted audio samples that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Karl Smith of NCC Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-4351.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-4352.title: Apple iOS Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Information and Execute Arbitrary Code andLocal Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Deny Service
CVE-2014-4352.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Apple iOS. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A local user can cause denial of service conditions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.The address book is encrypted with a key protected using only the hardware UID. A physically local user can exploit this flaw to read the address book [CVE-2014-4352].A local user may access attachments after the parent iMessage or MMS message has been deleted [CVE-2014-4353].The system automatically enables Bluetooth by default after upgrading iOS [CVE-2014-4354].The lock screen may display text message previews when the preview feature has been disabled [CVE-2014-4356].A physically local user can obtain potentially sensitive Accounts Framework information from log files [CVE-2014-4357].An application in the background can determine which application is frontmost [CVE-2014-4361].An application can bypass the sandbox to obtain Apple ID information [CVE-2014-4362].A remote user in a privileged network position can intercept user credentials that are autofilled on non-secure sites [CVE-2014-4363].A remote user can impersonate a WiFi access point to obtain the credentials via a the LEAP authentication process [CVE-2014-4364].When the mail server has advertised the LOGINDISABLED IMAP capability, the Mail application may still send login credentials in plaintext [CVE-2014-4366].The Voice Dial feature may be enabled after upgrading iOS [CVE-2014-4367].When using AssistiveTouch, the device may not lock the screen [CVE-2014-4368].An application can supply specially crafted IOAcceleratorFamily API arguments to trigger a null pointer dereference and cause the system to crash [CVE-2014-4369].An application can trigger a null pointer dereference in IntelAccelerator driver and cause the device to restart [CVE-2014-4373].A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an integer overflow and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-4377].A remote user can create a specially crafted PDF file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger an out-of-bounds memory read and execute arbitrary code [CVE-2014-4378].A remote user in a privileged network position can modify or spoof Last-Modified response headers to cause iOS to fail to update even when an update is required [CVE-2014-4383].A local user can exploit a path traversal flaw in App Installation to retarget code signature validation to a different bundle, allowing an unverified application to be installed [CVE-2014-4384].A local user can exploit a temporary file race condition in App Installation to allow an unverified application to be installed [CVE-2014-4386].An application can trigger an out-of-bounds write error in IOHIDFamily to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges [CVE-2014-4380].An application can trigger a validation flaw in the handling of metadata fields of IODataQueue objects to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4388, CVE-2014-4418].A local user can trigger a double-free memory error in the handling of Mach ports to execute arbitrary code or cause the kernel to crash [CVE-2014-4375].A local user can access uninitialized kernel memory statistics to determine memory layout [CVE-2014-4371, CVE-2014-4419, CVE-2014-4420, CVE-2014-4421].A local use can exploit a flaw in syslogd in the handling of permission changes to modify the permissions of arbitrary files [CVE-2014-4372].An application can supply a specially crafted XML External Entity value to trigger a flaw in NSXMLParser and obtain potentially sensitive information [CVE-2014-4374].An application can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read in the IOHIDFamily function to read kernel pointers [CVE-2014-4379]. This can be exploited to bypass kernel address space layout randomization.An application may be able to trigger a flaw in Libnotify to execute arbitrarycode with root privileges [CVE-2014-4381].An application can trigger an integer overflow in IOKit to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4389].An application can trigger a heap overflow in IOHIDFamily in the handling of key-mapping properties to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4404].An application can trigger a null pointer dereference in IOHIDFamily in the handling of key-mapping properties to execute arbitrary code with system privileges [CVE-2014-4405].An application can trigger an uninitialized memory access flaw in IOKit to read uninitialized data from kernel memory [CVE-2014-4407].A local user can trigger an out-of-bounds memory read in rt_setgate() to execute arbitrary code or crash the kernel [CVE-2014-4408].A remote web site can store HTML 5 application cache data and then later read the data during private browsing [CVE-2014-4409].A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption flaw in WebKit and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4410, CVE-2014-4411, CVE-2014-4412, CVE-2014-4413, CVE-2014-4414, CVE-2014-4415].An application may be able to infer some of the output of the random number generator used for kernel hardening measures in the boot process [CVE-2014-4422].An application can bypass the sandbox to gain information about the currently active iCloud account [CVE-2014-4423].Pieter Robyns, Bram Bonne, Peter Quax, and Wim Lamotte of Universiteit Hasselt, Adam Weaver, Eric Seidel of Google, Hendrik Bettermann, Heli Myllykoski of OP-Pohjola Group, Jonathan Zdziarski, evad3rs, Raul Siles of DinoSec, Maneet Singh, Sean Bluestein, Silviu Schiau, Mattia Schirinzi from San Pietro Vernotico (BR) Italy, cunzhang from Adlab of Venustech, Ian Beer of Google Project Zero, Catherine aka winocm, Andreas Kurtz of NESO Security Labs, Markus TroBbach of Heilbronn University, Tarjei Mandt of Azimuth Security, @PanguTeam, Felipe Andres Manzano of Binamuse VRT (via iSIGHT Partners GVP Program), Sven Heinemann, an anonymous researcher, George Gal of VSR, Fermin J. Serna of the Google Security Team, Mark Crispin, David Silver, Suman Jana, and Dan Boneh of Stanford University, Eric Chen and Collin Jackson of Carnegie Mellon University, Apple, the Google Chrome Security Team, Yosuke Hasegawa (NetAgent Co., Led.), and Tielei Wang and YeongJin Jang of Georgia Tech Information Security Center (GTISC) reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-4352.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.
