CVE-2014-6064.title: McAfee Web Gateway Accounts Tab Discloses Hashed Passwords to Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2014-6064.body: A vulnerability was reported in McAfee Web Gateway. A remote authenticated user can obtain hashed administrative passwords.A remote authenticated user can access the Accounts tab of the administrative interface to obtain hashed passwords for administrator accounts.The hashed passwords are unsalted and hashed with SHA1.David Cash from NCC Group reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6064.extra: A remote authenticated user can obtain hashed administrative passwords.

CVE-2014-6093.title: IBM WebSphere Portal Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-6093.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere Portal software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-6093.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere Portal software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-6119.title: IBM Security AppScan Enterprise Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scrpting Attacks and Gain Full Control of the Target System
CVE-2014-6119.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Security AppScan Enterprise. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary code on the target system. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.A remote user can supply a specially crafted archive to gain full control of the target system [CVE-2014-6119].The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input [CVE-2014-6121]. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Rational AppScan software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can supply a modified name of an argument to write files to a folder, resulting in command execution with administrator privileges [CVE-2014-6122].A remote user can conduct clickjacking attacks [CVE-2014-6135].
CVE-2014-6119.extra: A remote user can gain full control of the target system.A remote authenticated user can execute arbitrary commands on the target system with administrator privileges.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Rational AppScan software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-6140.title: IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager Mobile Device Management (MDM) Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-6140.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Tivoli Endpoint Manager Mobile Device Management (MDM). A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.The system uses static secret_token values. A remote user can create valid session cookies containing specially crafted data to execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with administrator privileges.All versions of the iOS extender, Self-service portal, Trusted Services provider, and Admin Portal components are affected.The vendor was notified on August 15, 2014.The original advisory is available at:https://www.redteam-pentesting.de/en/advisories/rt-sa-2014-012/-unauthenticated-remote-code-execution-in-ibm-endpoint-manager-mobile-device-management-componentsLutz Wolf of RedTeam Pentesting GmbH reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6140.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system with administrator privileges.

CVE-2014-6144.title: IBM Rational Quality Manager Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-6144.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM Rational Quality Manager. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2014-6144, CVE-2015-0124, CVE-2015-0128]. The code will originate from the site running the IBM Rational Quality Manager software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.For CVE-2015-0124 and CVE-2015-0128, versions prior to 3.0.1.6 iFix 4 and 4.0.7 iFix3 are affected.
CVE-2014-6144.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM Rational Quality Manager software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-6172.title: IBM API Management Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Encrypted Information
CVE-2014-6172.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM API Management. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive analytics information from the system log.
CVE-2014-6172.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive encrypted information.

CVE-2014-6176.title: IBM Business Process Manager May Use the Incorrect SSLv3 Version
CVE-2014-6176.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Business Process Manager Advanced. A remote user monitoring the network may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.The HTTP import binding in an SCA module does not honor the SSLv3 protocol settings in the SSL configuration. As a result, the system may use a weaker cryptographic configuration.
CVE-2014-6176.extra: A remote user monitoring the network may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-6176.title: IBM WebSphere Process Server and Enterprise Service Bus May Use the Incorrect SSLv3 Version
CVE-2014-6176.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Process Server and Enterprise Service Bus. A remote user monitoring the network may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.The HTTP import binding in an SCA module does not honor the SSLv3 protocol settings in the SSL configuration. As a result, the system may use a weaker cryptographic configuration.
CVE-2014-6176.extra: A remote user monitoring the network may be able to obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-6182.title: IBM Business Process Manager Process Center Lets Remote Authenticated Users View Arbitrary Files
CVE-2014-6182.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Business Process Manager. A remote authenticated user can view files on the target system.The software does not properly validate user-supplied input. A remote authenticated user can supply a specially crafted request containing directory traversal characters (e.g., '/../') to view arbitrary files on the target system.
CVE-2014-6182.extra: A remote authenticated user can view arbitrary files on the target system.

CVE-2014-6198.title: IBM Security Network Protection Input Validation Flaw Lets Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-6198.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Security Network Protection. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The system does not properly validate user-supplied requests. A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target authenticated user, will take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-6198.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target device acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-6209.title: IBM DB2 ALTER TABLE Statement Processing Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2014-6209.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.A remote authenticated user with certain privileges can issue a specially crafted ALTER TABLE statement on an identity column to cause the target DB2 server to terminate.The remote authenticated user must have one of the following privileges:- CONTROL or ALTER privilege on a table- ALTERIN privilege on any schema that contains a table- CREATETAB authority on a database and USAGE privilege on at least one table space
CVE-2014-6209.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-6210.title: IBM DB2 ALTER TABLE Bug Lets Remote Authenticated Users Cause the Target Service to Crash
CVE-2014-6210.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM DB2. A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.A remote authenticated user with certain privileges can issue a specially crafted ALTER TABLE statement on an identity column to cause the target DB2 server to terminate.The remote authenticated user must have one of the following privileges:- CONTROL or ALTER privilege on a table- ALTERIN privilege on any schema that contains a table- CREATETAB authority on a database and USAGE privilege on at least one table space
CVE-2014-6210.extra: A remote authenticated user can cause the target service to crash.

CVE-2014-6211.title: IBM WebSphere Commerce Debug Logging Lets Local Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-6211.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM WebSphere Commerce. A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.When certain command-line scripts are run with debugging enabled, the system logs user data to log files. A local user can access this potentially sensitive user information from log files.
CVE-2014-6211.extra: A local user can obtain potentially sensitive information on the target system.

CVE-2014-6214.title: IBM WebSphere Input Validation Flaws Permit Cross-Site Scripting and Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-6214.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in IBM WebSphere Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser [CVE-2015-0139, CVE-2015-0177]. The code will originate from the site running the IBM WebSphere software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.Only version 8.5 is affected by CVE-2015-0177.A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks to take actions on the target site acting as the target user [CVE-2014-6214].
CVE-2014-6214.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the IBM WebSphere software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-6221.title: IBM Rational ClearCase GSKit Does Not Generate Random Numbers
CVE-2014-6221.body: A vulnerability was reported in IBM Rational ClearCase. A remote user can obtain and modify potentially sensitive information.The GSKit MSCAPI/MSCNG Interface Code does not generate cryptographically random data. A remote user may be able to exploit this to bypass cryptographic based security mechanisms to obtain or modify data.
CVE-2014-6221.extra: A remote user can decrypt sessions to obtain and modify data.

CVE-2014-6268.title: Xen Initialization Flaw in evtchn_fifo_set_pending() Lets Local Guest Systems Crash the Host System
CVE-2014-6268.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the host system.The software does not properly handle uninitialized FIFO-based event channel control blocks. A local guest system can trigger a flaw in evtchn_fifo_set_pending() and cause the host system to crash.Vitaly Kuznetsov at Red Hat reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6268.extra: A local user on the guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the host system.

CVE-2014-6322.title: Microsoft Windows Audio Service Lets Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-6322.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Audio Service. A user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system in certain cases.A remote user that is able to exploit a separate vulnerability can trigger a permission validation flaw in the audio service component to gain elevated privileges.James Forshaw of Google Project Zero reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6322.extra: A user that can exploit a separate flaw can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-6323.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass ASLR Security Protection
CVE-2014-6323.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4143, CVE-2014-6337, CVE-2014-6341, CVE-2014-6342, CVE-2014-6343, CVE-2014-6344, CVE-2014-6347, CVE-2014-6348, CVE-2014-6351, CVE-2014-6353]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can cause scripts to be executed with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-6349, CVE-2014-6350].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from another domain [CVE-2014-6340, CVE-2014-6345, CVE-2014-6346].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's clipboard [CVE-2014-6323].A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features [CVE-2014-6339].s3tm3m (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Daniel Trebbien, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 0016EECD9D7159A949DAD3BC17E0A939 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jason Kratzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Takeshi Terada, Cloudfuzzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), A3F2160DCA1BDE70DA1D99ED267D5DC1EC336192 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), James Forshaw (via Google Project Zero), and Pengfei Guo of Qihoo 360 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-6323.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features.

CVE-2014-6324.title: Microsoft Windows Kerberos KDC Signature Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users
CVE-2014-6324.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows Kerberos. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges.The Microsoft Kerberos KDC implementation does not properly validate signatures. A remote authenticated unprivileged domain user can exploit this flaw to forge portions of a Kerberos service ticket and gain domain administrator privileges.This vulnerability is being actively exploited in limited situations. The vendor reports that the known active attacks do not affect Windows Server 2012 and Windows Server 2012 R2.The Qualcomm Information Security and Risk Management team, including Tom Maddock, reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6324.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain domain administrator privileges.

CVE-2014-6331.title: Microsoft Active Directory Federation Services Logout Failure Lets Local Users Access the Target User's Account
CVE-2014-6331.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Active Directory Federation Service. A local user can access the target user's account in certain cases.The system does not properly logout an authenticated user. A local user can re-open the application from an open browser window after the target user has ostensibly logged out to obtain potentially sensitive information.
CVE-2014-6331.extra: A local user can access potentially sensitive information from the target user's account in certain cases.

CVE-2014-6332.title: Microsoft Windows OLE Automation Array Bug Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-6332.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Robert Freeman of IBM X-Force reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6332.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-6333.title: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-6333.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A double object delete may occur [CVE-2014-6333].An object index error may occur [CVE-2014-6334].An invalid pointer error may occur [CVE-2014-6335].Microsoft Word Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack are also affected.Ben Hawkes of Google Project Zero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-6333.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-6334.title: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-6334.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A double object delete may occur [CVE-2014-6333].An object index error may occur [CVE-2014-6334].An invalid pointer error may occur [CVE-2014-6335].Microsoft Word Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack are also affected.Ben Hawkes of Google Project Zero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-6334.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-6335.title: Microsoft Word Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-6335.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Word. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted file that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A double object delete may occur [CVE-2014-6333].An object index error may occur [CVE-2014-6334].An invalid pointer error may occur [CVE-2014-6335].Microsoft Word Viewer and Microsoft Office Compatibility Pack are also affected.Ben Hawkes of Google Project Zero reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-6335.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-6337.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass ASLR Security Protection
CVE-2014-6337.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4143, CVE-2014-6337, CVE-2014-6341, CVE-2014-6342, CVE-2014-6343, CVE-2014-6344, CVE-2014-6347, CVE-2014-6348, CVE-2014-6351, CVE-2014-6353]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can cause scripts to be executed with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-6349, CVE-2014-6350].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from another domain [CVE-2014-6340, CVE-2014-6345, CVE-2014-6346].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's clipboard [CVE-2014-6323].A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features [CVE-2014-6339].s3tm3m (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Daniel Trebbien, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 0016EECD9D7159A949DAD3BC17E0A939 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jason Kratzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Takeshi Terada, Cloudfuzzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), A3F2160DCA1BDE70DA1D99ED267D5DC1EC336192 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), James Forshaw (via Google Project Zero), and Pengfei Guo of Qihoo 360 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-6337.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features.

CVE-2014-6352.title: Microsoft Windows OLE Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-6352.body: A vulnerability was reported in Microsoft Windows. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a Microsoft Office file containing a specially crafted OLE object that, when loaded by the target user, will and execute arbitrary code on the target system. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.Drew Hintz, Shane Huntley, and Matty Pellegrino of the Google Security Team and Haifei Li and Bing Sun of the McAfee Security Team, and Yu Wang, Bin Wang, and Donghui Zhang of the Baidu Security Team (X-Team) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6352.extra: A remote user can create a file that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.

CVE-2014-6353.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Multiple Memory Corruption Flaws Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code, Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information, and Bypass ASLR Security Protection
CVE-2014-6353.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Microsoft Internet Explorer. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can determine the installation path.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory corruption error and execute arbitrary code on the target system [CVE-2014-4143, CVE-2014-6337, CVE-2014-6341, CVE-2014-6342, CVE-2014-6343, CVE-2014-6344, CVE-2014-6347, CVE-2014-6348, CVE-2014-6351, CVE-2014-6353]. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.A remote user can cause scripts to be executed with elevated privileges [CVE-2014-6349, CVE-2014-6350].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from another domain [CVE-2014-6340, CVE-2014-6345, CVE-2014-6346].A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information from the target user's clipboard [CVE-2014-6323].A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features [CVE-2014-6339].s3tm3m (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Daniel Trebbien, Bo Qu of Palo Alto Networks, James Forshaw of Context Information Security, SkyLined (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), 0016EECD9D7159A949DAD3BC17E0A939 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Jason Kratzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), Takeshi Terada, Cloudfuzzer (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), A3F2160DCA1BDE70DA1D99ED267D5DC1EC336192 (via HP's Zero Day Initiative), James Forshaw (via Google Project Zero), and Pengfei Guo of Qihoo 360 reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-6353.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can bypass Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR) security protection features.

CVE-2014-6377.title: Juniper JunosE ICMP Processing Error Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-6377.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper JunosE. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send specially crafted ICMP packet to the target interface or loopback IP address when DEBUG severity icmpTraffic logging is enabled to cause an SRP reset.Logging severity levels below DEBUG will not trigger an SRP reset.E Series routers are affected.The vendor has assigned CQ 97568 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6377.extra: A remote user can cause a SRP reset.

CVE-2014-6378.title: Juniper Junos RSVP PATH Processing Flaw Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-6378.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can send a specially crafted RSVP PATH message packet to cause the target routing protocol daemon (rpd) to crash, preventing routing updates from being processed.Interfaces with RSVP enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 954509 and 954508 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6378.extra: A remote user can cause the target rpd to crash.

CVE-2014-6379.title: Juniper Junos Duplicate RADIUS Configuration Entry May Let Remote Users Bypass Authentication in Certain Cases
CVE-2014-6379.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user may be able to bypass authentication in certain cases.On systems configured for RADIUS authentication and accounting, when a RADIUS accounting server is configured (under '[system accounting destination radius]'), a duplicate entry may be automatically made to 'pam_radius.conf'. If the accounting server is later removed from the original configuration, the duplicate entry in 'pam_radius.conf' will remain and may allow for unintended authentication success.The vendor has assigned PR 947307 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6379.extra: A remote user may be able to bypass authentication in certain cases.

CVE-2014-6381.title: Juniper WLC Series Lets Remote Users on the Wireless Network Deny Service
CVE-2014-6381.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper WLC Series devices. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user on the wireless network can send specially crafted data to cause the target WLC device to disconnect from the cluster, denying service to the wireless access points.Systems with the 'Proxy ARP' or 'No Broadcast' features enabled in a clustered WLC setup are affected.
CVE-2014-6381.extra: A remote user can cause the target WLC device to disconnect from the cluster, denying service to the wireless access points.

CVE-2014-6384.title: Juniper Junos TACACS+ Configuration Flaw Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-6384.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.When authorization attributes in the TACACS+ configuration contain double quotes, a local user can bypass policy to run restricted commands.
CVE-2014-6384.extra: A local user can run restricted commands that are ostensibly block by policy.

CVE-2014-6438.title: Ruby Parsing Error in 'URI.decode_www_form_component' Lets Remote Users Deny Service
CVE-2014-6438.body: A vulnerability was reported in Ruby. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions on the target system.A remote user can submit a specially crafted URI that, when parsed by the target application using the 'URI.decode_www_form_component' method, will trigger a catastrophic regular expression backtracking and cause the target application to crash or consume excessive resources on the target system.A demonstration exploit command is provided:ruby -v -ruri -e'URI.decode_www_form_component "A string that causes catastrophic backtracking as it gets longer %"'
CVE-2014-6438.extra: A remote user can cause the target application to crash or consume excessive resources on the target system.

CVE-2014-6447.title: Juniper Junos J-Web Bugs Let Remote Users Conduct Cross-Site Scripting and Denial of Service Attacks
CVE-2014-6447.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Juniper Junos J-Web. A remote user can cause the target service to crash. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The interface does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target administrative user's browser. The code will originate from the Juniper Junos interface and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote user can cause the target J-Web service to crash.The vendor has assigned PR 959990 to these vulnerabilities.Kyle Lovett reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6447.extra: A remote user can cause the target service to crash.A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the Juniper Junos interface, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the interface, or take actions on the interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-6449.title: Juniper Junos Fragmented Packet Processing Flaw Lets Local Users Consume Excessive Buffer Memory Resources
CVE-2014-6449.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A local user can consume excessive buffer memory on the target system.A local user can supply specially crafted fragmented packets to the target device to consume all available buffer resources on the target system and deny service for connections to the target device. Transit connections through the target device are not affected.
CVE-2014-6449.extra: A local user can consume excessive buffer memory resources on the target system.

CVE-2014-6450.title: Juniper Junos IPv6 Processing Error Lets Remote Users Cause the Target System to Crash
CVE-2014-6450.body: A vulnerability was reported in Juniper Junos. A remote user can cause the target system to crash.A remote user can send specially crafted IPv6 packets to trigger mbuf chain corruption and cause a kernel panic.Systems IPv6 enabled are affected.The vendor has assigned PR 1016371 to this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-6450.extra: A remote user can cause the target system to crash.

CVE-2014-7155.title: Xen x86 Instruction Emulation Flaw Lets Local Guest Users Gain Elevated Privileges on the Guest System
CVE-2014-7155.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on a guest system can obtain elevated privileges or cause denial of service conditions on the guest system.The x86 emulation code does not properly check supervisor mode permissions of HLT, LGDT, LIDT, and LMSW instructions. A local user on an HVM guest system can obtain guest kernel privileges or cause the guest system to crash.Andrei Lutas at BitDefender reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7155.extra: A local user on a guest system can obtain elevated privileges or cause denial of service conditions on the guest system.

CVE-2014-7156.title: Xen x86 Emulation Error Lets Local Guest System Users Deny Service on the Host System
CVE-2014-7156.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on a guest system can cause denial of service conditions on the guest system.The x86 emulation code does not properly check supervisor mode permissions of software interrupts. A local user on an HVM guest system can cause the guest system to crash.Andrei Lutas at BitDefender reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7156.extra: A local user on a guest system can cause the guest system to crash.

CVE-2014-7188.title: Xen x2APIC Emulation Flaw Lets Local Guest Systems Obtain Data from Other Guest Systems or the Host System
CVE-2014-7188.body: A vulnerability was reported in Xen. A local user on a guest system and cause the host system to crash. A local user on a guest system can read data from other guest systems or from the host system.The x2APIC emulation code uses an incorrect model-specific register (MSR) range for Advanced Programmable Interrupt Controller (APIC) use. A local user on a guest system can exploit this to read portions of hypervisor memory.x86 systems are affected. ARM-based systems are not affected.Jan Beulich at SUSE reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7188.extra: A local user on a guest system and cause the host system to crash.A local user on a guest system can obtain data from other guest systems or from the host system.

CVE-2014-7216.title: Yahoo Messenger Stack Overflow in Processing Emoticons Packages Lets Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-7216.body: A vulnerability was reported in Yahoo Messenger. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system.A remote user can create a specially crafted emoticons package that, when installed by the target user, will trigger a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target user's system when the target user logs in. The code will run with the privileges of the target user.An emoticons package that contains a specially crafted 'shortcut' and 'title' parameter value in the 'emoticons.xml' file can trigger this flaw.The vendor was notified on May 3, 2014. The original advisory is available at:https://www.rcesecurity.com/2015/09/cve-2014-7216-a-journey-through-yahoos-bug-bounty-program/Julien Ahrens from RCE Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7216.extra: A remote user can create content that, when installed by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system when the target user logs in.

CVE-2014-7237.title: TWiki 'Sandbox.pm' File Validation Flaw Lets Remote Authenticated Users Upload Arbitrary Windows Apache Configuration Files
CVE-2014-7237.body: A vulnerability was reported in TWiki. A remote authenticated user can upload an arbitrary Apache configuration file.On Windows-based systems, a remote authenticated user can upload an arbitrary '.htaccess' Apache configuration file. The file can then be used to make other uploaded files executable by the Apache server process.A specially named file ('%00.htaccess.') can exploit this flaw.The TWiki-VM (virtual machine) running in a Windows server environment is not affected.The vulnerability resides in 'twiki/lib/TWiki/Sandbox.pm'.The vendor was notified on October 1, 2014.Netanel Rubin of Check Point Software reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7237.extra: A remote authenticated user can upload an arbitrary Apache configuration file.

CVE-2014-7286.title: Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution Buffer Overflow in AClient Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-7286.body: A vulnerability was reported in Symantec Altiris Deployment Solution. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A local user can trigger a buffer overflow in AClient to overwrite memory and gain elevated privileges on the target system.Parvez Anwar (@parvezghh) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7286.extra: A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-7288.title: Symantec Encryption Management Server Lets Local Users Gain Elevated Privileges and Remote Users Inject Email Headers
CVE-2014-7288.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Symantec Encryption Management Server. A local user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system. A remote user can inject arbitrary email headers.A local administrative user can supply specially crafted command line input when requesting a database backup to gain elevated privileges on the target system [CVE-2014-7288].Paul Craig of VantagePoint reported this vulnerability.A remote user can supply a specially crafted UID value to exploit an input validation flaw in the key management component when uploading a PGP public key to inject arbitrary email headers in the receipt email that the server generates [CVE-2014-7287].Klaus Eisentraut (via SySS GmbH) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7288.extra: A local administrative user can obtain elevated privileges on the target system.A remote user can inject arbitrary email headers.

CVE-2014-7809.title: Apache Struts Predictable Tokens Let Remote Users Bypass Cross-Site Request Forgery Protection
CVE-2014-7809.body: A vulnerability was reported in Apache Struts. A remote user can bypass cross-site request forgery protections.A remote user can predict the token values used to prevent cross-site request forgery attacks.Applications that use <s:token/> support are affected.Philippe Arteau of Groupe Technologies Desjardins reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7809.extra: A remote user can bypass the cross-site request forgery protection.

CVE-2014-7827.title: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2014-7827.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote authenticated user can add or modify system information. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user that can send XML requests to a RESTEasy endpoing can send a specially crafted request that specifies external external entities to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target application server [CVE-2014-7839].A remote authenticated user with the Maintainer role can exploit a flaw in the Role Based Access Control (RBAC) implementation to add, modify, or undefine certain restricted attributes and values [CVE-2014-7849].A remote authenticated user with a role that has access to attributes with socket-binding-ref but not to attributes with security-domain-ref sensitivity classification on the target JBoss Application Server (WildFly) can exploit a flaw in the JacORB subsystem to gain access to potentially sensitive information in the security-domain attribute [CVE-2014-7853].A remote authenticated user can exploit a policy fallback flaw in the org.jboss.security.plugins.mapping.JBossMappingManager implementation to bypass security restrictions [CVE-2014-7827]. The SAML2 STS Login Module is affected.The system does not properly handle conversation state information when a conversation ends. A remote user may be able to access potentially sensitive information from a previous conversation [CVE-2014-8122].Rune Steinseth of JProfessionals, Darran Lofthouse of the Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Team, and Ondra Lukas of the Red Hat Quality Engineering Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7827.extra: A remote authenticated user can add, modify, or undefine certain restricted attributes and values.A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7830.title: Moodle Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting, Cross-Site Request Forgery, and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2014-7830.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Moodle. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Moodle software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The mapcourse script in Feedback module is affected [CVE-2014-7830].The 'mod/forum/settracking.php' script is affected [CVE-2014-7838].The 'mod/lti/request_tool.php' and 'mod/lti/instructor_edit_tool_type.php' scripts are affected [CVE-2014-7836].Some AJAX scripts and manually created pages may not send proper encoding headers, which may allow cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2014-9059].The generate_password() function generates weak temporary passwords [CVE-2014-7845].A remote authenticated user without the capability to view hidden grades can access grades via the get_grades web service [CVE-2014-7831]. Versions 2.7 and 2.7.2 are affected.A remote authenticated user can bypass capability checks in 'mod/lti/launch.php' in the LTI module [CVE-2014-7832].A remote authenticated user can view group-level entries in the Database activity module for another group after being edited by a teacher [CVE-2014-7833].A remote authenticated unprivileged user can access the list of available tags in the system [CVE-2014-7846].When server load is increased, a remote user can access the IP lookup geo-mapping script [CVE-2014-7847].A remote authenticated user can bypass a group check in the forum_get_discussions web service [CVE-2014-7834].A remote user can directly access an internal file ('lib/phpunit/bootstrap.php') to determine the file system path [CVE-2014-7848].Web services with a file upload function are affected [CVE-2014-7835].A remote authenticated user that can delete pages in at least one Wiki activity in the course can modify a URL to delete pages in other Wiki pages in the same course [CVE-2014-7837].A remote user can bypass a session key check to print arbitrary messages [CVE-2014-9060].Petr Skoda, Dan Poltawski, Aaron Barnes, Damyon Wiese, Frederic Massart, Pamela Verret, and Sam Marshall reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7830.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Moodle software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7831.title: Moodle Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting, Cross-Site Request Forgery, and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2014-7831.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Moodle. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Moodle software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The mapcourse script in Feedback module is affected [CVE-2014-7830].The 'mod/forum/settracking.php' script is affected [CVE-2014-7838].The 'mod/lti/request_tool.php' and 'mod/lti/instructor_edit_tool_type.php' scripts are affected [CVE-2014-7836].Some AJAX scripts and manually created pages may not send proper encoding headers, which may allow cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2014-9059].The generate_password() function generates weak temporary passwords [CVE-2014-7845].A remote authenticated user without the capability to view hidden grades can access grades via the get_grades web service [CVE-2014-7831]. Versions 2.7 and 2.7.2 are affected.A remote authenticated user can bypass capability checks in 'mod/lti/launch.php' in the LTI module [CVE-2014-7832].A remote authenticated user can view group-level entries in the Database activity module for another group after being edited by a teacher [CVE-2014-7833].A remote authenticated unprivileged user can access the list of available tags in the system [CVE-2014-7846].When server load is increased, a remote user can access the IP lookup geo-mapping script [CVE-2014-7847].A remote authenticated user can bypass a group check in the forum_get_discussions web service [CVE-2014-7834].A remote user can directly access an internal file ('lib/phpunit/bootstrap.php') to determine the file system path [CVE-2014-7848].Web services with a file upload function are affected [CVE-2014-7835].A remote authenticated user that can delete pages in at least one Wiki activity in the course can modify a URL to delete pages in other Wiki pages in the same course [CVE-2014-7837].A remote user can bypass a session key check to print arbitrary messages [CVE-2014-9060].Petr Skoda, Dan Poltawski, Aaron Barnes, Damyon Wiese, Frederic Massart, Pamela Verret, and Sam Marshall reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7831.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Moodle software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7835.title: Moodle Bugs Permit Cross-Site Scripting, Cross-Site Request Forgery, and Information Disclosure Attacks
CVE-2014-7835.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Moodle. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks. A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.Several scripts do not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the Moodle software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.The mapcourse script in Feedback module is affected [CVE-2014-7830].The 'mod/forum/settracking.php' script is affected [CVE-2014-7838].The 'mod/lti/request_tool.php' and 'mod/lti/instructor_edit_tool_type.php' scripts are affected [CVE-2014-7836].Some AJAX scripts and manually created pages may not send proper encoding headers, which may allow cross-site scripting attacks [CVE-2014-9059].The generate_password() function generates weak temporary passwords [CVE-2014-7845].A remote authenticated user without the capability to view hidden grades can access grades via the get_grades web service [CVE-2014-7831]. Versions 2.7 and 2.7.2 are affected.A remote authenticated user can bypass capability checks in 'mod/lti/launch.php' in the LTI module [CVE-2014-7832].A remote authenticated user can view group-level entries in the Database activity module for another group after being edited by a teacher [CVE-2014-7833].A remote authenticated unprivileged user can access the list of available tags in the system [CVE-2014-7846].When server load is increased, a remote user can access the IP lookup geo-mapping script [CVE-2014-7847].A remote authenticated user can bypass a group check in the forum_get_discussions web service [CVE-2014-7834].A remote user can directly access an internal file ('lib/phpunit/bootstrap.php') to determine the file system path [CVE-2014-7848].Web services with a file upload function are affected [CVE-2014-7835].A remote authenticated user that can delete pages in at least one Wiki activity in the course can modify a URL to delete pages in other Wiki pages in the same course [CVE-2014-7837].A remote user can bypass a session key check to print arbitrary messages [CVE-2014-9060].Petr Skoda, Dan Poltawski, Aaron Barnes, Damyon Wiese, Frederic Massart, Pamela Verret, and Sam Marshall reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7835.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the Moodle software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.A remote authenticated user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7849.title: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2014-7849.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote authenticated user can add or modify system information. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user that can send XML requests to a RESTEasy endpoing can send a specially crafted request that specifies external external entities to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target application server [CVE-2014-7839].A remote authenticated user with the Maintainer role can exploit a flaw in the Role Based Access Control (RBAC) implementation to add, modify, or undefine certain restricted attributes and values [CVE-2014-7849].A remote authenticated user with a role that has access to attributes with socket-binding-ref but not to attributes with security-domain-ref sensitivity classification on the target JBoss Application Server (WildFly) can exploit a flaw in the JacORB subsystem to gain access to potentially sensitive information in the security-domain attribute [CVE-2014-7853].A remote authenticated user can exploit a policy fallback flaw in the org.jboss.security.plugins.mapping.JBossMappingManager implementation to bypass security restrictions [CVE-2014-7827]. The SAML2 STS Login Module is affected.The system does not properly handle conversation state information when a conversation ends. A remote user may be able to access potentially sensitive information from a previous conversation [CVE-2014-8122].Rune Steinseth of JProfessionals, Darran Lofthouse of the Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Team, and Ondra Lukas of the Red Hat Quality Engineering Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7849.extra: A remote authenticated user can add, modify, or undefine certain restricted attributes and values.A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7852.title: JBoss Portal Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-7852.body: A vulnerability was reported in JBoss Portal. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The RichFaces component does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can create a specially crafted URL that, when loaded by a target user, will cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the JBoss RichFaces application and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.
CVE-2014-7852.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the JBoss RichFaces application, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-7853.title: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Bugs Let Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information and Remote Authenticated Users Bypass Security Controls
CVE-2014-7853.body: Several vulnerabilities were reported in Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform. A remote authenticated user can add or modify system information. A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user that can send XML requests to a RESTEasy endpoing can send a specially crafted request that specifies external external entities to read files on the target system with the privileges of the target application server [CVE-2014-7839].A remote authenticated user with the Maintainer role can exploit a flaw in the Role Based Access Control (RBAC) implementation to add, modify, or undefine certain restricted attributes and values [CVE-2014-7849].A remote authenticated user with a role that has access to attributes with socket-binding-ref but not to attributes with security-domain-ref sensitivity classification on the target JBoss Application Server (WildFly) can exploit a flaw in the JacORB subsystem to gain access to potentially sensitive information in the security-domain attribute [CVE-2014-7853].A remote authenticated user can exploit a policy fallback flaw in the org.jboss.security.plugins.mapping.JBossMappingManager implementation to bypass security restrictions [CVE-2014-7827]. The SAML2 STS Login Module is affected.The system does not properly handle conversation state information when a conversation ends. A remote user may be able to access potentially sensitive information from a previous conversation [CVE-2014-8122].Rune Steinseth of JProfessionals, Darran Lofthouse of the Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform Team, and Ondra Lukas of the Red Hat Quality Engineering Team reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7853.extra: A remote authenticated user can add, modify, or undefine certain restricted attributes and values.A remote authenticated user can bypass security restrictions.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7874.title: HP System Management Homepage Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Request Forgery Attacks
CVE-2014-7874.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP System Management Homepage. A remote user can conduct cross-site request forgery attacks.A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP System Management Homepage software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to take actions on the site acting as the target user.David Jorm of Red Hat Product Security reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7874.extra: A remote user can take actions on the target interface acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-7882.title: HP SiteScope Lets Remote Authenticated Users Gain Elevated Privileges
CVE-2014-7882.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP SiteScope. A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.No details were provided.Jitendra Chauhan (via 3slabs.com) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7882.extra: A remote authenticated user can gain elevated privileges on the target system.

CVE-2014-7883.title: HP Universal Configuration Management Database HTTP TRACE Processing Lets Remote Users Obtain Potentially Sensitive Information
CVE-2014-7883.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP Universal Configuration Management Database (UCMDB). A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can supply a specially crafted HTTP TRACE request to obtain potentially sensitive information.Hans-Martin Mnch (via mogwaisecurity.de) reported this vulnerability.
CVE-2014-7883.extra: A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7896.title: HP XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition Input Validation Flaw Permits Cross-Site Scripting Attacks
CVE-2014-7896.body: A vulnerability was reported in HP XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition. A remote user can conduct cross-site scripting attacks.The software does not properly filter HTML code from user-supplied input before displaying the input. A remote user can cause arbitrary scripting code to be executed by the target user's browser. The code will originate from the site running the HP XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition software and will run in the security context of that site. As a result, the code will be able to access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.HP XP7 Global Link Manager (HGLM) and HP Device Manager are also affected.
CVE-2014-7896.extra: A remote user can access the target user's cookies (including authentication cookies), if any, associated with the site running the HP XP P9000 Command View Advanced Edition software, access data recently submitted by the target user via web form to the site, or take actions on the site acting as the target user.

CVE-2014-7899.title: Google Chrome Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Information
CVE-2014-7899.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.A use-after-free may occur in pdfium [CVE-2014-7900, CVE-2014-7902].An integer overflow may occur in pdfium [CVE-2014-7901].A buffer overflow may occur in pdfium [CVE-2014-7903].A buffer overflow may occur in Skia [CVE-2014-7904].A remote user may be able to bypass access controls and navigate to an intent object [CVE-2014-7905].A use-after-free may occur in pepper plugins [CVE-2014-7906].A use-after-free may occur in blink [CVE-2014-7907].An integer overflow may occur in media [CVE-2014-7908].A remote user can spoof the address bar [CVE-2014-7899].A remote user may be able to access uninitialized memory via Skia [CVE-2014-7909].Other unspecified flaws exist [CVE-2014-7910].Eli Grey, cloudfuzzer, Atte Kettunen from OUSPG, WangTao(neobyte) of Baidu X-Team, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of the NSFOCUS Security Team, Christoph Diehl, and miaubiz reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7899.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7900.title: Google Chrome Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Obtain Information
CVE-2014-7900.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.A remote user can create specially crafted HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target system.A use-after-free may occur in pdfium [CVE-2014-7900, CVE-2014-7902].An integer overflow may occur in pdfium [CVE-2014-7901].A buffer overflow may occur in pdfium [CVE-2014-7903].A buffer overflow may occur in Skia [CVE-2014-7904].A remote user may be able to bypass access controls and navigate to an intent object [CVE-2014-7905].A use-after-free may occur in pepper plugins [CVE-2014-7906].A use-after-free may occur in blink [CVE-2014-7907].An integer overflow may occur in media [CVE-2014-7908].A remote user can spoof the address bar [CVE-2014-7899].A remote user may be able to access uninitialized memory via Skia [CVE-2014-7909].Other unspecified flaws exist [CVE-2014-7910].Eli Grey, cloudfuzzer, Atte Kettunen from OUSPG, WangTao(neobyte) of Baidu X-Team, Chen Zhang (demi6od) of the NSFOCUS Security Team, Christoph Diehl, and miaubiz reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7900.extra: A remote user can create HTML that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can obtain potentially sensitive information.

CVE-2014-7912.title: Google Android Buffer Overflows in DHCP Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code
CVE-2014-7912.body: Two vulnerabilities were reported in Google Android DHCP. A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.A remote user (server) can return specially crafted DHCP data to trigger a buffer overflow and execute arbitrary code on the target system.The get_option() function in 'dhcp.c' is affected [CVE-2014-7912].The original advisory is available at:http://www.zerodayinitiative.com/advisories/ZDI-15-093/Juri Aedla reported this vulnerability via HP's Zero Day Initiative.The print_option() function in 'dhcp-common.c' is affected [CVE-2014-7913].
CVE-2014-7912.extra: A remote user can execute arbitrary code on the target system.

CVE-2014-7927.title: Google Chrome Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2014-7927.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target user's system.A memory corruption flaw may occur in ICU [CVE-2014-7923].A use-after-free memory error may occur in IndexedDB [CVE-2014-7924].A use-after-free memory error may occur in WebAudio [CVE-2014-7925].A memory corruption flaw may occur in ICU [CVE-2014-7926].A memory corruption flaw may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7927].A memory corruption flaw may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7928].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7930].A memory corruption flaw may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7931].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7929].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7932].A use-after-free memory error may occur in FFmpeg [CVE-2014-7933].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7934].A use-after-free memory error may occur in Speech [CVE-2014-7935].A use-after-free memory error may occur in Views [CVE-2014-7936].A use-after-free memory error may occur in FFmpeg [CVE-2014-7937].A memory corruption flaw may occur in Fonts [CVE-2014-7938].A same-origin-bypass error may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7939].A uninitialized-value error may occur in ICU [CVE-2014-7940].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in UI [CVE-2014-7941].A uninitialized-value error may occur in Fonts [CVE-2014-7942].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in Skia [CVE-2014-7943].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in PDFium [CVE-2014-7944].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in PDFium [CVE-2014-7945].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in Fonts [CVE-2014-7946].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in PDFium [CVE-2014-7947].A caching error may occur in AppCache [CVE-2014-7948].A remote user can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-1346].Various other flaws exist [CVE-2015-1205].yangdingning, Collin Payne, mark.buer [at] booktrack.com, Christian Holler, cloudfuzzer, Atte Kettunen of OUSPG, Aki Helin of OUSPG, Khalil Zhani, Christoph Diehl, Takeshi Terada, miaubiz, fuzztercluck, and jiayaoqijia reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7927.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.

CVE-2014-7941.title: Google Chrome Multiple Bugs Let Remote Users Execute Arbitrary Code and Deny Service
CVE-2014-7941.body: Multiple vulnerabilities were reported in Google Chrome. A remote user can cause arbitrary code to be executed on the target user's system. A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.A remote user can create specially crafted content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code or cause denial of service conditions on the target user's system.A memory corruption flaw may occur in ICU [CVE-2014-7923].A use-after-free memory error may occur in IndexedDB [CVE-2014-7924].A use-after-free memory error may occur in WebAudio [CVE-2014-7925].A memory corruption flaw may occur in ICU [CVE-2014-7926].A memory corruption flaw may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7927].A memory corruption flaw may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7928].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7930].A memory corruption flaw may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7931].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7929].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7932].A use-after-free memory error may occur in FFmpeg [CVE-2014-7933].A use-after-free memory error may occur in DOM [CVE-2014-7934].A use-after-free memory error may occur in Speech [CVE-2014-7935].A use-after-free memory error may occur in Views [CVE-2014-7936].A use-after-free memory error may occur in FFmpeg [CVE-2014-7937].A memory corruption flaw may occur in Fonts [CVE-2014-7938].A same-origin-bypass error may occur in the V8 engine [CVE-2014-7939].A uninitialized-value error may occur in ICU [CVE-2014-7940].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in UI [CVE-2014-7941].A uninitialized-value error may occur in Fonts [CVE-2014-7942].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in Skia [CVE-2014-7943].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in PDFium [CVE-2014-7944].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in PDFium [CVE-2014-7945].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in Fonts [CVE-2014-7946].A out-of-bounds read error may occur in PDFium [CVE-2014-7947].A caching error may occur in AppCache [CVE-2014-7948].A remote user can cause denial of service conditions [CVE-2015-1346].Various other flaws exist [CVE-2015-1205].yangdingning, Collin Payne, mark.buer [at] booktrack.com, Christian Holler, cloudfuzzer, Atte Kettunen of OUSPG, Aki Helin of OUSPG, Khalil Zhani, Christoph Diehl, Takeshi Terada, miaubiz, fuzztercluck, and jiayaoqijia reported these vulnerabilities.
CVE-2014-7941.extra: A remote user can create content that, when loaded by the target user, will execute arbitrary code on the target user's system.A remote user can cause denial of service conditions.
